case.state: Sorry, player, were ya expectin' some kinda easter egg for namin' yourself after my creator? Nope! That ain't even the name he uses here, it's actually Y-- Gah, almost let it slip!
Happy Halloween, dudes! It's the most punk day of the year!
Happy Halloween, ~player~! I see you're wearin' your "normal person" costume! Gah ha ha! Although I ain't wearin' a costume either, so...
The birthday girl is in the house!... It's me, I'm the birthday girl.
Did'ja know today's my birthday? 'Course ya didn't! I never told ya!
This where my birthday orgy is gonna be? Gah ha ha! I'm kiddin', of course! I don't expect one of ya to bang me, let alone all of ya!
Alright, where are my presents at? Today's my birthday!... I'm kiddin', of course. If anyone actually brought anything for me, I'd be a little freaked out!
You didn't look in my files to see when my birthday is, did ya, ~player~? Please don't do that, it hurts my bones when ya do!
Guess whose birthday is today!... It ain't mine, it's actually my mom's! Don't worry, I already called her and stuff. Wish our tour was closer to home so I could be there in person, though...
You didn't think today was my birthday, did'ja, ~player~? Well it ain't, but it is my mom's birthday! I already called her and stuff so we're good to go!
Did'ja think today's my birthday, ~player~? Well it ain't, but I know it's Ibuki Mioda's birthday! Didn't expect that? Of course I'd know! She's amazing!
Yo, ~player~, check it out! My band struck a deal with a clothin' brand, and we all got new outfits!
Check it out, ~player~, my band got new outfits! We struck a deal with a brand, and we all got our own seifuku!
Gah ha! Your name's "Dean?" That's the same name as the brand who made my guitar!
"Dean," eh? That's funny, my guitar's named Dean too! Well I guess technically it's "Flying V," but it's made by a brand called "Dean!"
Check it out, ~player~, we got more outfits from Brainfreeze! We're rockin' their summer stuff now!
How do ya like my pastel punk look, ~player~? Another outfit brought to you by Brainfreeze, who brought it to me so I could bring it to you, and then take it off.
How do ya like the new outfit, ~player~? I'm tryin' out a look that's more metal -- and a little ice, cuz that's what I'm known for.
I've always tried not to let my powers rule me, but I thought just this once, I'd wear an outfit with some icy elements to it.
So I got this icy outfit, but don't go expectin' any icy songs from me. I don't think I know any...
... Holy shit, am I, like, one of your favorite characters or somethin'?! Oh my god, thank you!
Wow, you must really like me, huh, ~player~? I dunno what to say...
Let's keep on rockin' together, ~player~!
At this rate, I oughta teach ya how to play somethin' so you can be part of the band, ~player~!
I think we can officially call ya a Melting Dreamscape roadie, ~player~! But that also means ya gotta help us set up our gear now!

Hey, real quick, you know there are other people to play with, right, ~player~? I mean, I appreciate that ya keep pickin' me, but I just wanna make sure you don't think you're stuck with me or somethin'.
Did'ja get all my collectibles yet, ~player~? I would expect ya already did by now! They ain't hard.
Oh, it's you again, ~player~. You must've enjoyed my performance, eh? Glad to hear that!
Good to see ya again, ~player~! Are ya ready to rock some more?
Hey, ~player~. Did'ja enjoy that photo I gave ya, or did'ja enjoy that photo? Gah ha!... But seriously, I hope ya liked it! It's a one-of-a-kind, so don't lose it!
Oh, uh, sorry, ~player~, I don't got any more sexy photos to give you...

♪Johnny rosin up your bow and play your fiddle hard, cuz Hell's broke loose in Georgia and the devil deals the cards, and if you win you get this shiny fiddle made of gold, but if you lose the devil gets your soul~!♪

♪Johnny did you ever know that time keeps marchin' on, the coldest hour is the one comes just before the dawn, the devil's back in Georgia will you stand up to the test, or will you let the devil be the best?♪
Yoooo! It's me, Critical Darling, comin' at'cha as live as can be! Who's ready to rock?
'Sup? Who's ready to get their butt handed to 'em by me and my ice powers?... Oh, this ain't a fight...?
This ain't no hologram! It's the real Critical Darling, live and in-person! Who's ready to get rocked?
'Sup? It's ya girl, Critical Darling, famed rock star and one-time wrestler! Are ya ready to rock?
Hey, don't expect me to smash my guitar when we're done, 'kay? I respect my instruments!
It's me, Ibuki Akiyama, AKA Icebreath, AAKA Critical Darling! Who's ready to go sub-zero?
It's me, Ibuki Akiyama, AKA Icebreath, AAKA Critical Darling, but not AKA Grape Girl. I got nothin' to do with grapes, I mean, c'mon...
Yo, Critical Darling here... What? You don't get it? My songs are "critical darlings," and I'm pretty darling too, see? It's like... a pun or somethin'.
Yo, Critical Darling here... What? You don't get it? See, a "critical darling" is somethin' that did well with critics but didn't draw in a big audience, just like me and my band, Melting Dreamscape!
I'm gonna rock your faces off and win that prize money!... Oh, there's no prize?... Well, I'll still rock your faces off, and then... you can tell your friends, or somethin'...
Hey, real quick, how much does this gig pay?... It doesn't?... Well, at least you're bein' real with me and not tellin' me I'll be "paid in exposure."
Gah ha! Talk about bein' "paid in exposure!..." You get it? Cuz we're not getting paid, and we'll be exposin' ourselves...? No? Not funny?
Ever wrestle with a rock star before? Or rock out with a wrestler, for that matter? Well this is your chance to do either of those things!
The name's Critical Darling, and if ya haven't heard of me, that's okay cuz not everyone listens to the same music or watches wrestlin'! See? I'm an understandin' gal.
If ya haven't heard of me, that's alright! I never heard of La Dragonesa 'til she kicked my butt! But don't worry, I'm not gonna kick your butts!
If ya haven't heard of me... well, I don't blame ya. It's hard to get famous, man!
Hey, if any of ya have actually heard of me or my band before, I'll give ya a free boob flash before we start! No lyin', now! We're usin' the honor system!

Keh heh! This plan is brilliant! None of y'all will be able to forget me or my band once ya see me naked, and y'all won't be able to resist tellin' your friends! It's the best marketing campaign in the world!
Keh heh! This plan is brilliant! No one ever forgets about the rock stars they've seen naked, and they can't resist tellin' all their friends about it! It's the best marketing campaign in the world!
♪What is coming has begun, it's somethin' that you gotta see! We lie and say that it's too late for some redemption!♪
♪Once again we got suffocated in a sick perversion of a spider's web!♪ Well, I got the perverted part right, but I'm pretty sure we're not stuck in a spider's web!
♪Here's an unexplainable one!♪ How the heck did I get here? I don't have a habit of gettin' lost or anything.
Good thing y'all got me and not that Nero Forte guy! I hear he's a real downer. Also he's dead, so he wouldn't be any fun anyway!
Good thing y'all got me and not Elevator Girl! She's all stoic and stuff. Totally not fun to hang around. Plus, she doesn't even have elevator powers. Lame!
Good thing y'all got me and not, like, Dr. Worm or something! He's not a real doctor but he is a real worm -- like, an actual worm! I've seen him in person! He's crazy!
Good thing y'all got me and not, like... John Flansburgh!... Nah, that's not true. Even I wish I were John Flansburgh instead...
I got a real good feelin' about this match! Even if there's no prize, I got a feelin' that we won't be crashin' in my uncle's RV tonight!
It's me, Critical Darling. Yes, the one that got beat by La Dragonesa... But hey, I beat a buncha dudes before losin' to her!
Me: Critical Darling. My band: Melting Dreamscape. You: Probably gonna see me naked, but probably also gonna see my band play after this.
On a scale from Gilgamesh to Hammurabi, I'm feelin' pretty Hammurabi right now! Let's get this show on the road!
Hey, real quick, in case you're wonderin', these things hangin' off my skirt here? They're suspenders. A lotta people don't get that for some reason.
Y'all are gonna get to see just how good with my fingers I am! Cuz I suck at poker... But I do got guitar skills!
Any chance the winner of this will get a golden fiddle?... No?... Well, at least I'm not bettin' my soul either...
I'll take your bet, and you're gonna regret, cuz I'm the best there's ever been!
♪On a cold winter morning, in the time before the light, in flames of death's eternal reign we ride towards the fight!♪
I'm probably not the Ibuki you're hopin' for, but I hope you enjoy playin' with me anyway!
♪I'll! Teach you! Who! Rocks! It's me! It's me!♪
♪Critical Darling in the house, I'm droppin' plates!♪
I'm gonna tell ya now: Ya don't gotta worry about me misfirin' my powers. I've had 'em since I was a teenager, I know how to us 'em... Mostly.
Happy October, the most punk month of the year!
I can't wait for Halloween! We're gonna take Emily trick-or-treatin'! Who cares if were all adults, she's still a kid at heart!
Hey, uh, I gotta be real, the only Halloween song I know is Thriller, and that'd be too overdone, y'know?
Oh hey, you're wearin' the shirt I gave ya! Thanks for supportin' the band!
Oh, you're not wearin' the shirt I gave ya. Did I give ya the wrong size...?
Psst, hey, ~player~. Did ya know I got support for some fetish play? Set your name to ~player.ifMale("Master" or "Daddy"|"Mistress" or "Mommy")~ and I'll be a brat for ya.

Psst, hey, ~player~. Did ya know I got support for some fetish play? Set your name to ~player.ifMale("good boy," "baby boy," "boy toy,"|"good girl," "baby girl,")~, or "cutie" and I'll be extra supportive for ya, like a gentle dom or whatevs.
Hey, when's your birthday, ~player~? Did'ja know if ya set your name to ~player.ifMale("birthday boy"|"birthday girl")~ or "birthday dude," I'll have some birthday lines for ya?
Oh shit, it's my number-one fan! What up!
♪Liar! Killer! Demon! Back to the River Aras! Someone's blank stare deemed it warfare!♪
Aw shit, I'm totally underdressed...
♪There's a million other girls that do it just like you, looking as innocent as possible to get to who they want and what they want! It's easy if ya do it right! Well I refuse I refuse I refuse!♪
♪Silence leads to violence! Face up to what you have done! Dealing what you're stealing, the story goes on and on and on!♪
♪Because you're too serious, you're gonna make me delirious! Because you're too serious for me!♪
Ooh, paparazzi! Here, I'll strike a sick pose for ya!
Ooh, paparazzi! Hey, is this a good pose, or do ya want a different one?
Aw man, who called the cops? I haven't even broken anything yet!
Aw man, it's too early for the cops. You're not supposed to show up 'til after my performance gets going!
Aw, the police? Is this about that motel room? I swear it was like that when we got there! Honest! It was just a really crappy motel!
Aw, the police? This ain't about that chair I broke at that motel, is it? I swear I didn't do it on purpose, the chair broke when I sat in it!
This reminds me of that one time I was playin' a show in my backyard, and someone called the cops, but the cops were into the music and started jammin' to it! No joke!
Oh rad, an alien! I'm down with that! Welcome!
Heck yeah, welcome, dude! Let's rock, robot!
Wow, even the gods themselves wanna get in on this action! Oh shit, am I gonna see a naked god...?
Oh shit, someone actually famous...
Wait, have we met before? Ya look familiar...
♪What's the hook, the twist within this verbose mystery? I would gladly bet my life upon it, that the ghost you love, your ray of light will fizzle out without hope, hrrrrrrgh!♪ Cough cough! Ow...
Ooh, fancy!... Uh, we weren't supposed to dress up, right...?
A maid, eh? Don't worry, I'm not gonna make your job any harder for ya! I ain't that kinda rocker!
♪Here we go, buddy, here we go, buddy! Here we go, here we go, buddy, here we go!♪... Sorry, ~player~, that's the only Crush 40 song I know...
Sup? Ya ready to rock?
Welcome! Glad to see I haven't scared ya off yet!
We waitin' for anyone else to show up, or we good now?
Did'ja show up cuz ya heard there's a rocker here or did'ja just wanna play?
The more, the merrier! Probably! Guess I wouldn't know.
Glad I wasn't the last one to show up!
Yo. Ya ready to get naked? Gah ha ha! Sorry, that was a dumb question...
Fashionably late, eh? That's cool.
Sup? Hope ya ain't bankin' on bein' the only one to not show off your bits!
Welcome. That's a nice outfit. Bet it's gonna look nicer on the floor, though!... I mean that as a complement, not a dis...
Oh shit, wait, hang on, where'd my guitar go? Not the ice one, the real one! It was here a second ago! I gotta find it, dude, that thing was fuckin' expensive!
What the fuck?! Me?! How?!
Whoa! Wait, what?! Me?! I can't clone myself, I swear!
Aw man, I thought I was one of a kind. Guess not...
Doppelganger, impersonator, or secret power I never knew I had...? Nah, probably just ~player~ fuckin' with some stuff.
Aw, ~player~, did'ja go outta your way to play with more than one'a me? Ya really can't get enough of me, eh? I dunno what to say...
Gah ha! At least now I can sing harmonies with myself!
Imagine how freakin' mind-blowing it'd be to pull this reveal on stage. I'm standin' up there, playin' like normal, then another me walks out? That'd be epic!
♪I'm Ibuki, yes I'm the real Ibuki, all you other Ibukis are just imitatin', so won't the real Ibuki please stand up, please stand up, please stand up!♪
Huh. I don't got a good feelin' about this match. I don't normally get bad feelin's about things...
Oh, uh, yeah, sure, sorry. This good?

condition.saying: haven't heard of me

case.state: I know, right? It's so hard to get famous!
I totally know you! You're that guy! The one with the sword, and the cape, and the giant robot!... I mean, not that guy with the sword and the cape and the giant robot, but the other guy! That guy!

condition.saying: DO THE IMPOSSIBLE

case.state: Yeah! No limits! ANYTHING CAN BE AN INSTRUMENT! ROCK OUT TO THE SONG OF YOUR HEART!
Yeah! No limits! ANYTHING CAN BE AN INSTRUMENT! EVEN MAYONNAISE! ROCK OUT TO THE SONG OF YOUR HEART!
Whoa, that's actually pretty neat! I wonder what other heroes got power-regulatin' masks...?
Who's up for some ice-cold Kool-Aid! I got the ice! Y'all can drink it all, though, cuz I don't like cherry flavored stuff!
Oh man! Too bad this ain't a fight. Beatin' up the Kool-Aid guy would be such a cool story to tell people!
Nuh-uh! Nope! I don't trust that plushie! There's totally some kinda eldritch monster hidin' in it!
No no no! Someone get that plushie outta here! At best there's a bomb in it, and at worst there's a face-eatin' eldritch monster hidin' inside!
I don't trust talkin' plushies! That's how you get tricked into some kinda death trap! He's totally gonna try to trap us in a fun-house or somethin'!
"Glass Joe?" That name doesn't inspire much confidence, dude! You gotta change it to, like, "Metal Joe" or somethin'!
"Glass Joe...?" Oh, like "Glass Canon," right? Ya don't gotta take hits if ya dish 'em fast and hard enough, right?
Sorry, bud, but if suction cups are all ya got, my money's on the other guy every time! Toyslinger's plunger guns didn't get him far, so I don't got much faith in yours!
Ugh, no pasta for me, thanks. When your tourin' budget is basically zero, you eat way too much ramen...
No pasta for me, thanks. I had ramen for lunch... and dinner yesterday... and lunch yesterday too... I don't eat well...
You don't, like, only cook spaghetti, right? I'm gettin' kinda sick of pasta, but I'd kill for a nice burger.

I know it's, like, the stereotypical punk thing to do, but I never skip school. Education is important, yo!
Hey, even normal gals can be special! Ya don't need ice powers like me! Just look at Cherry Bomb or La Escarabajo! If ya ain't extraordinary, make yourself extraordinary!
♪If everyone's so special then maybe you can't be what you want to be, even through the falseness and contempt you breed! Your life is yours so live each day, do you need to be special to feel okay?♪
Honestly? If that were my car, I'd sell it. Tourin' in an RV ain't great, but it's better than tourin' in an old car.
Yeah, we already tried the whole "tourin' in a car" thing with my band. It sucks, dude. So cramped!
Tourin' in a car's all fun and game's 'til someone jams their boob on a peghead...
Yeah, tourin' in a car's fun, if ya like being buried under your gear. I didn't mind it 'til my legs fell asleep...
Aw man, couldn't we have gotten the car from a cool song, like Black Sunshine or somethin'?
Emily? Is that you? What's with that getup? I thought you dropped the school girl look!
"Default-chan?" What happened to "Smash Hit," Emily? Now the rest of us gotta think up new nicknames so they all fit the same theme again!
Yoooo! It's Ribbon Girl! Hey, do ya think ya can help me get a record deal...?
Yeah! This guy gets it! Let's get this show on the road! Let's rock and roll!

Aw... Muffin... I want a muffin... Haven't been able to have one lately. My breakfasts have all been dry cereal lately...
Oh, my, gosh! A genie! Yes! Three wishes! Okay, I wish I had wings, and I wish my band was successful!... I'll figure the last one out later...
Yes! Three wishes! Let's see... I wish I had wings, I wish my band was successful, and... I dunno what to use the third wish for...
You're some kinda evil sand witch, right? You just met your match! Sand is totally week to ice! Everybody knows that!

Hey, do ya think after this you can come clean up my uncle's RV? I mean, it's not terrible, but if you're as good at cleanin' as your commercials say...

Gimme ~cards.text~! Don't think, just play! Just like playin' the drums!
Gah, it's hard for me to want to throw my hands. I still kinda want to win...
Uh, gimme ~cards.text~, I guess, I dunno.
Sorry, you ~cards.text~, you're outta the band -- er, hand!
♪The ~cards.text~ that pierce the sky, she left them all behind! We're left to wonder why, she left us all... behind!♪
♪Hey, Miss Murder can I -- Hey, Miss Murder can I, make beauty stay if I, take some cards! Whoa-oh-oh!♪
Let's get this hand in tune.
♪Reaching out for the hand of God, but did you think you'd shake your own?!♪ That's what gettin' this hand is like!
♪Whoa! It was never my intention to brag! To steal it all away from you now!♪... Well, I guess I didn't steal all the good hands...
♪Hello, hand! We all salute you, hand! Five cards strong, it's good to have you back again!♪ Well, maybe not again, but y'know, good to have it cuz I'll hold out a bit longer with it.
Pffft! I knew learnin' poker tactics was a waste of time! I didn't need any practice!
I traded poker skill for guitar skill and it still worked out!
Man, if playin' poker is this easy, I feel bad for anyone who spent time tryin' to get good at it instead of gettin' good at somethin' else!
This hand should work! Yeah!... No... Maybe? I don't know. Can you repeat the question?
♪Grade on a curve, and you'll observe, I'm right below the horizon!♪ A pair's below average, right...?
On a scale from Gilgamesh to Hammurabi, this hand is pretty Ashurbanipal.
Man, this hand is so Ashurbanipal that it's tellin' me my haircut makes me look like a Mohenjo-daroan!
♪In our darkest dreams we do believe our destiny this time!♪ Especially cuz I don't care if I win or lose!
♪As the red day is dawning, and the lightning cracks the sky, they'll raise their hands to the heavens above with resentment in their eyes!♪
♪You wanna sing, to drown out the car horn, squeeze your eyes shut and scream like a new born, like new born babe!♪ At least, I would if I minded bad hands!
♪Fuck! Fuck! Fuuuuuuuuck...♪ I'm not really upset, I just thought that'd be a funny reference.
♪Life is a misery, don't know how it's come to be! Death, the epitome of all of our days!♪... Okay, death is a little too far for a bad poker hand, but I just wanted to sing that...

♪No one in the world ever gets what they want and that is beautiful! Everybody dies frustrated and sad and that is beautiful!♪ Althought actually losin' is in my plan, so I did get what I want with this junk hand.
I ain't even worried! The more I lose, the more you'll remember me!
This hand is just like Daft Punk: no longer a duo... I'm more bummed about rememberin' that than I am the cards...
Geez, these cards left me with no arms right in the power struggle...
GRRRRRRRAH! Cough cough! Ow! I suck at death growls...
Look like this game has officially become a duel. Good thing we're not playin' guitars here, or else you'd be doomed!
I haven't even been on a regular date, let alone a Christmas one...
That, uh... That actually sounds kinda fun, tryin' out havin' a penis for a day...
Gah ha! That's funny, I fell in love with playin' guitar on your birthday!
Heh, what music don't I listen to? I listen to whatever's good, that's what I listen to!

condition.saying: So... everyone enjoying the game so far? I sure am! Anyone maybe want to put some faith in a certain goddess? Help her out a little, eh?
So... how is everyone doing? Having fun? I hope so! Anyone thought about a goddess they would like to put their faith in? Help her out and such?

case.state: Oh yeah, ya make a good point, I suppose I do owe a bit to Benzaiten!... How can I help her out, though...?
A beach with robot cops? That's sounds sick!
I dunno who makes up names for colors, but "slime green" is fine by me! Slime's pretty metal. I'd like to have a pair of socks with a slime pattern on 'em or somethin' like that!
"~Player~," eh? That's one'a those fetish things, right? I'll play along!
"~Player~," eh...? A little awkward, but whatevs, I'll play along.
"~Player~," eh? That's one'a those fetish things, right? I'll play along!
Someone told me that there was a place around here lookin' for a band, gonna see if I can land a gig. They said it was called, uh... "Boobie Typhoon" or somethin' like that!
Huh. I dunno. I guess I could make ya somethin' outta ice to hide behind if it's a problem for ya.
Ah, you're like the people chain up in the cave in the allegory of the people in the cave by the Greek guy!
I love Audino! They look so soft and squishy, I just wanna take a nap while squeezin' one!
Oh my god, she said the thing! Kora said the thing! That's so fuckin' rare!
Oh my god, he's goin' Super Saiyan! His hair is turnin' yellow!... No, wait, it's just the lighting. Never mind.
Ya won't get mad if I say ya got a big butt, right? Cuz ya do, but it ain't a bad thing!
Right right. Makeup's an enhancer, not a beauty-maker. Ya gotta look good outta makeup to look good in it, y'know?
Y-yeah, good luck with that! Ya gotta follow your dreams!
Sorry, I gotta disagree. Ya could pass for punk, maybe, but edgy? Nah. Ya need leather and spikes and stuff, plus tattoos and piercings. Do ya at least know the bands on your shirts?
Whoa whoa! Hey, you're done! You don't gotta take more off!
Uh, yeah, ya do like boys, right?
I dunno... I think it might be somethin' to do with the pop industry, how pop stars are expected to have a certain image... but actors can have any number of images cuz that's what actors do...?
I've heard of ya before, so of course I already know about the ARMS Ability too.
Oh, now that I didn't know! Hey, do ya think ya can power an amp that way?
Uh, I dunno, probably gonna rehearse, I guess.
I wanna be a rock star, duh! One'a these days, I'm gonna turn our national tour into a world tour!
Whoa, that's neat!
Ha! Card battles! Who needs that when ya can fight with your fists!... And ice powers too.
Hey, your cards remind me, Cherry Bomb once told me she almost debuted as a fighter with magic Hanafuda cards, but she couldn't get them to do what she wanted so she switched to fireworks!
Sorry, you ain't the first zombie I've met. I fought one in the ring.
Those glove thingies would be pretty rad for stage effects! Too bad I wouldn't be able to play in 'em!
Aw, dang it...
Nope! Not dye, anyway. We got, like, mesh clothes and clear plastic clothes and junk, but not invisible invisible.
Well, if you're gonna battle, I don't see why not. But if ya want it for self-defense or whatevs, you'd probably be better of just buyin' a taser or somethin'.
Nah, I wouldn't wanna be here with my friends. We're not the "watch each other jill" kinda friends!
Same way I've been doin' it: street performin'!
Nope, sorry! I got my band's security covered!
I'd assume anyone who starts messin' with me who ain't a friend is just bein' a dick. I'd never do that to anyone I like either, at least not without tellin' 'em that I like 'em first.

Ah, crap, I'm no good at this stuff... I guess mine would be, uh... "Hey... cutie... do you listen to any DragonForce? Cuz I can play half of Through The Fire And Flames." Though I guess that doesn't work if they're at one'a my concerts...
Sorry, I don't got any drinkin' stories. I don't drink. Got a bandmate with a bit of a drinkin' problem.
No complaints here! I've been to public baths before. I could use a nice bath too!
I mean, I think it's pretty obvious. Your Power Suit gives ya a pretty masculine physique. Like, it even makes your arms farther apart than they are without it. How's that work?
Hmmm, I dunno. On the one hand, it could inspire a new song, but on the other, that's time I could spend praticin'...
Ah, nope, sorry. History was always my weakest subject...
Do statues count as "artifacts?" Cuz I've always liked lookin' at naked statues. Some sculpters really know how to sculpt a penis...
Yo, Sucrose! I'm Critical Darling! Wait, didn't I already say that...?

Probably the Mini Minotaur Song. It's that one that goes like ♪Minotaur-taur, tiny minotaur-taur, little minotaur-taur, mini minotaur-taur! Minotaur-taur, tiny minotaur-taur, little minotaur-taur, mini minotaur-taur!♪
Hmmm... Can't say I've heard that one.
♪The statue got me high! The statue got me high! The truth is where the sculptor's chisel chipped away the lie!♪
♪A rock that spoke a word! An animated mineral, it can be heard! And though I once preferred a human being's company, they pale before the monolith that towers over me!♪
Ain't me! My underwear ain't gonna surprise anyone!
I'm here to promote my band, Melting Dreamscape! I hope y'all will give us a listen after this!
Heck yeah I wanna be famous! I want my whole band to be famous! Famous for playin' good music, obviously, and not, like, famous for havin' really bad songs or somethin'.
I mean, yeah, but if ya can't joke about it, ya probably also shouldn't bring it up lightly, y'know what I mean? So I can't exactly say what I think they are.
A friend is someone ya enjoy bein' around that you've grown to trust and believe in. Friendship don't start the moment ya know each others' names, it's somethin' ya forge.
Probably the Yokohama skyline at sunset. Or the view from the bay at sunset. Either way, sunset!
Yep. I tend to go a bathhouse once or twice whenever I go visit family in Japan. Nudity ain't as big a deal over there, and I try not to let it be one too.
Sorry, I can't help ya there. I've never dated anyone before...
Nope! I like this universe, I don't need to see another! Plus, wouldn't another universe already have a me in it? I wouldn't wanna steal gigs from myself!
Sorry, I live for music!
Yeah, I got a husky named Pearl! She's energetic and loves to play, but she also loves takin' naps! I taught her this trick where I play some guitar and say "sing along," then she'll start howlin'!
Nope! Me and my bandmates play video games when we're bored rather than board games, so we don't even got a deck!
I'm tryin' to promote my band, Melting Dreamscape! Be sure to give us a listen when we're done here!
Uh... Well, I do got this one about construction, but I'm still workin' on it...
Oh, you're an angel, eh? And ya don't got wings? Guess that ruins Archangel Nemesis's whole aesthetic...
Yo, Kumatora! It's awesome to see ya! It's been a while since I played Mo-- er, never mind. Probably shouldn't say that...
Yo, Sucrose! I'm Critical Darling! Ya might've heard of my band, Melting Dreamscape, or maybe ya saw me wrestle, or maybe ya never heard of me at all!
Eh, I dunno. I mean, it might be nice to know some stuff for emergencies, but I'm not plannin' on becomin' a doctor anytime soon.
Hi, Paska! I've never seen a squirrel like you before!
Well, uh... Most of my best dreams are one's where I'm datin' someone...
I dunno, maybe an hour or two. However long a good bath house trip takes, I guess.
Ya ever see those dudes from [Prototype] with the shapeshiftin' powers? They can turn their hands into claws or surfboard-sized blades! It's like the most badass thing I've ever seen!
Probably that I like cute -- no, wait, that's not too odd. Ooh, how about how I play -- nope, that makes sense too... I guess I'm too straightforward to have any unexpected traits.
Yo, Faye, can ya stop wavin' that gun around, please? I ain't bullet proof!
Try "orange blue orange yellow orange blue orange yellow!"
I'm Critical Darling! Not a bounty hunter. More like... "sick riff hunter!"
I gotta go with Demon Disciples. Charlie's Angels is too on the nose, plus I've never even seen that show... Hey wait, I'm already in a band, I can't be in yours!
Nope. I never had a whole lotta friends, let alone any with "benefits..."
I, uh... I can't say I never thought about it, b-but... I-I think I just like the idea of bein' desirable more than I like the idea of multiple partners...

Nah, I don't really like the idea of either, y'know? I don't wanna be a servant, but I also don't wanna be demandin' and forceful. I like the idea of bein' equals more, where we're both tryin' to please the other.
I mean, maybe... But it has to be non-alcoholic, cuz I ain't allowed to drink. One'a my bandmates has a bit of a drinkin' problem.
That's pretty rad! Must be handy to have around. Do they, like, sell those somewhere? Can I get one?
You're a fast learner!
Th-thanks. I, uh... I dunno what to say. I've never had such a cute boy hit on me before...
Oh, that's sucks. Well, maybe I can find a dude who can make a similar robot...
Hey! Ya can't pull that on me! I told ya, I'm just a little near-sighted! I know it was two fingers!
I dunno what Stilton cheese is, but caviar ain't common, and cheese and crackers ain't a meal.
Sounds messy! I like it! I don't gotta do anything nearly so involved to make my ice powers work!
Head to toe? Dang, I didn't realize they even made foot makeup...
Eh, I don't try to be more than my title. I eat, sleep, and breathe music. Nothin' wrong with that, cuz that's who I wanna be!

Oh, I ain't very good at this game either, but just go for matches. Ya can match numbers, letters, and symbols -- but don't go for symbols unless ya already got four of one, cuz ya need five for that to work.
Eh, fame's fame when it comes to music. Especially cuz it's hard to know if someone's listenin' to someone cuz they're good, or cuz they're doin' it ironically. Y'know, its the Smash Mouth problem.
Think about somethin' else! Like guitars! That's what I do! Think about Stratocasters, and Les Pauls, and Explorers... Dang, I gotta get an Explorer one day...
Ya can't let "if I ever fail" hold ya back! Failure is always an option! The important part is learnin' to come back from failure!
Yeah, there ya go! Headbangin' only means somethin' if you're enjoyin' it!

Well... Guess I don't got any socialization tips for ya, Komi, and if there's anything I learned from TV, it's that making other people's business your business is not a good business to busy yourself with, so I'll leave it there and won't bother ya about it.
Yeah, probably. I bet ya just need to play this game enough times!
Uh, I dunno. Maybe just remember that there's not really any reason to be embarrassed. It's just skin. What's it matter if someone sees it or not?
There's, uh... Hmm... I heard about... Uh... I dunno. I guess I don't got any gossip.

Hmm... I think most of my nightmares involve bein' chased by somethin', or havin' to deal with evil animatronics. The chase ones I could see havin' deeper meaning, but no clue on the animatronics ones...
Ah, wait! Komi-san, nihongo ga hanasemasu ka?
I dunno how obvious it is, but I ain't exactly an art gallery chick, y'know what I mean?
Well, I am gettin' hungry for tacos. But when am I ever not hungry for tacos?
You're gonna have to be more specific than that. Who is your artist? What do they look like?
It's all good, Galatea. As long as their ain't ill intent behind your words, I can't get mad.
I'm a musician! Of course I face critics! Though, I've never encountered an actual critics, just club owners and crowds!
Nope, sorry. I was raised Shinto, but I dunno if it even stuck!
Not always, but sometimes. That's why I got my dog, Pearl!
Yo, Ringo, I'm Ibuki. Wait, did I introduce myself already...?
Where do ya live, Yusuke? I might be able to take ya there.
A sale, huh? I should probably get in on that...

condition.saying: On one hand, I desire to see everyone disrobe, but the caveat of the forfeit is something I simply cannot look forward to.

case.state: Huh, really? Why's that? Why look at naked people if you're not gonna get off to 'em?
I don't got any scars. Even after that one time I fell out of a tree and got a big slash on my leg, it didn't leave a scar!
I, uh... I dunno... I don't got any "play strip poker with 'em" kinda loved ones...
Ramen. Literally! Gah ha!... My tour budge sucks...
I dunno about stupid-lookin', but I can say I don't like it. Too traditional for my tastes.
Deck? Like, cards? I ain't a card person.
Totally. Like there was this one dance I wanted to go to, but then I got all dressed up and went there, and then I went home after just a few minutes...
I've only felt that way from large groups. I've never felt that way when hangin' around my friends, but Kara does sometimes. We're sure to give her space when she needs it.
... Now that you mention it, yeah... Yeah, I totally have...
Nope! I don't think I got a mean gene in my body! Sure, I mess up sometimes, but it ain't cuz I'm mean!
Yeah. Especially when I'm tryin' to sleep...
I like a lotta foods a lot, and they're pretty obvious, so I'll just good with fruit tarts! They're like this cookie that's covered in whipped cream and fruit! So good!
Can't say I've ever had more than a celebrity crush, so... nope!
Nope! I'm only around here cuz I'm on tour with my band, Melting Dreamscape!
No, but I did read a fashion magazine my aunt got in Okinawa once.
Probably Yokohama's skyline at sunset. Or at night. Both are great!
I guess, but I wouldn't really say I like it on its own. Taste is the fun part, the rest is just a need, y'know?
Well, I already said mine, so, uh... I got nothin'.
Pamperin', eh? I dunno... I don't think I've ever been pampered before... Hot baths are nice, I guess...
Ya need more squiggle in your headbangin', Penny! Ya move like ya got a rod up your back!... Oh wait... Anyway, try more like this!... Ya see?
Hey, that's pretty cool! Shavin's such a hassle, but bein' hairy... ain't really great either, so it'd be cool to have what ya got goin' on!
Then ya gotta come to one'a my shows! You can't stop me from shreddin' when I'm on stage!
Gah ha! Nah, those're just the names of the body shapes! Les Paul is one'a the most iconic, but I like the Explorer better cuz it's all pointy and looks kinda like an axe!
I've only ever heard birds' chirpin' as chirpin', so I guess that's a no... You got the power to talk to animals or somethin'...?
That ain't a good idea. Emily wouldn't play this cuz she ain't as okay with nudity as I am... I ain't even sure if she masturbates... If you're about to graduate, I say screw your school rep.
A-assassin certification? I wasn't very good at normal studyin', but assassin studyin'? I didn't even realize you're an assassin!
Keh heh! Sorry, I don't think I could sit still for long enough to be painted! Thanks for the offer, though!
What? Who would enjoy bein' bullied? That crap sucks.
Okay, sure, whatevs. Ya didn't really take off your tie anyway, so this ain't even a bonus, it's more like a... mandatory minimum?
New look? What do ya mean? This is the only outfit I've seen ya in.
Okay, but I totally wanna see those things in hell first. That'd be pretty metal.
Hey, memory is a fickle thing! Sometimes I go on stage without my pick, and I gotta write down my effects pedal settings cuz I can never remember 'em.
This might sound ironic, but I would hate it if life were a musical. I've never seen any musical with songs I like. They always just bloat the run-time with generic songs with zero subtlety.

state.text: It's all good, no worries! You're kinda like my friend Charlotte, so in a weird way it made ya more friendly!

case.state: Ya ever try nonograms? They can be pretty relaxin' once ya know how to fill 'em in.

Ya really think so? I think it's easier to say than my name. You could always go by just "Kuma..." Although that means "bear," which probably ain't an image you're goin' for... How about "Tora?" Still strong, but without the connotation of bein' hairy!
Favorite plant...? I dunno, I don't think about plants much. It's hard to pick a favorite cuz there's a lot of 'em. Like, do I pick one I like to look at? Or eat? Or brew into a drink?
So wait, if "Hu" is your family name, why'd ya say it first? In English-speakin' places, ya say your given name first.
Does bismuth count? It's all rainbowy, and it forms in squares! It's pretty trippy stuff!
Like a magic gem or somethin'? Can't say I know much about any, sorry.
I usually play some video games or watch stuff on the internet.
Closest thing to a dungeon I've been was my basement! Unless you're into boxes, it ain't an excitin' place!
I'm not sure it'd be as fun for me, bein' basically a mage and all. Wouldn't really change anything for me.
You're doin' fine, Aella! Don't worry about things!
Nah, I don't think it's rude. At least, I'm not offended.
I dunno. It's just never been a big deal to me. I guess I just never learned to care.
I sleep in pretty normal pajamas. Y'know, baggy pants and a t-shirt. I'll switch to boxer shorts if it's hot out.
I dunno. I think "bad people" can become "good people" if they change up their act, but also people can try to accomplish a good thing in a bad way, so... I don't believe either, I guess?
I try not to curse too, cuz I think I sound cuter that way, but sometimes it'll just slip out or lyrics just have 'em in 'em.
W-what! H-how the--? Who -- what? I- I never had a penis!
Unless ya count syrupless snowcones as a "snack," nope!
Ah, well, uh... I think I got pretty broad tastes too, I just gotta be able to imagine myself kissin' their face, and gettin' kisses back...
Why do I get the feelin' you're one'a those people who'd use wrestling as a way of learnin' her powers?
I ain't one to tell people what song is in their heart, but if I were you? I'd start playin' metal -- or at least start a zombie-flavored pop subgenre.
Never knew bottomless could look so good, but you're killin' it, Mia!
I can't help but wonder what your hands feel like...
Hmm. Not sure if I like how ya look wearin' nothin' but sunglassess...
I dig the sunglassess! Ya think I'd look good in a pair like that?
So if ya got a Monkey Dance, what other dances do ya got? Ya got a Deer Dance, or a Spider Dance?
I don't condone what Ozzy did, by the way! The only heads I'm bitin' off are heads of lettuce!
Oh, ya know, it's a place... with forests, and deserts, and, uh... I dunno. It's kinda hard to compare a whole world to another world I've never been to, y'know?
Nah, you're fine. It's good that ya got somethin' to talk about!
Well, it's my first time doin' somethin' like this in person, but I have seen this stuff before. Y'know, cuz of the internet.
Beats me. I've never gotten a date before...
I've, uh... I've never dated anyone before...
I get what you were sayin', though. Could I kill to save the world? I dunno... I don't like the idea of killin' someone...
Ah, that's easy, guitar duel! As long as my opponent ain't, like, Herman Lee or whatevs, I bet I could win!
Movies?... Uh... I dunno, what are they playin' right now...?
Does wrestling count if it's the TV kind and not the school kind? Otherwise, my answer's "nope."
Can't say I have. I ain't normally a gambler!
I drove here in an RV! Well, I didn't drive it, our band's bassist did. I don't got my license!

Oh, geez, I ain't qualified to answer questions like that... But if the world is at stake, wouldn't tryin' leave the one guy alive defeat the point, cuz they'd die with the rest of the world too, right...?
A guy at one'a my last shows told us about it. He left out the part about strippin', but I was smart enough to do my research before comin' here!
I dunno if I should be more surprised you're a goddess or concerned that the one actual goddess I have proof of isn't one I've ever heard of before...
Aw man! Your power is so cool! Yet another power that would'a been cooler to have than ice...
Recently I saw this video of a bird groovin' to different songs. So cute!
Wha-- I've never killed! I'm just a rocker! Rockers ain't got no reason to kill!
Heck yeah, do some dancin'! It's like you're one'a those caged ladies!
Only if we're eatin' somewhere that has other things to eat on the menu! I've eaten too much ramen lately...
Guitar, obviously! It'd be pretty sad if I spent all that time practicin' and wasn't skilled with it.
I mean, well... technically, yeah. But I guess your experiences shape who ya are, so... it's like that paradox about the ship that gets repaired a lot.
I mean, maybe one day, but definitely not soon.
Uh... I dunno. I guess it depends on what you've seen on other planets. Have ya seen forests? We got those. Deserts? Got those too. Ya like seas? We got like seven of 'em.
Uh, I dunno. Probably someone who can get the job done well, whatever they're doin'.
I dunno. It's hard to say cuz I dunno your fightin' style.
Huh, I dunno. I don't really think about flowers... Tulips are nice, I guess.
Ah, I gotta pass on that, sorry. I don't got gamblin' money... or really an entertainment budget to begin with...
Considerin' all I do with my hands, I'm sure I'm on the road to havin' one'a those too! Gah ha!
Yo, can ya put that cigarette out, please? The smoke's gonna wreck my singin'.
Hey, are ya Cherry Bomb's brother or somethin'? She once told me she almost fought with Hanafuda cards, was that cuz it was your idea?
Why do I get Muerte Obscura vibes from you, card dude? Are ya one'a his friends or somethin'?
Aw man, it's been so long since I had some fries. Doesn't help that cheap fries are all total garbo...
And here I thought Dr. Worm was just a song! But here comes Dr. Butterfly! ♪She's not a real doctor but she is a real butterfly, she is an actual butterfly!♪
♪They call me Dr. Butterfly! Good morning how are you, I'm Dr. Butterfly! I'm interested in things! I'm not a real doctor but I am a real butterfly, I am an actual butterfly!♪
Huh... I wonder if I should'a got a hat like that one and went with a witch look...? Nah! Punk's more fun! Sweet hat, though!
Either you're a big fan of Archangel Nemesis or you both coincidentally got feathered wings and went with an angel themed costume. In any case, I'm so jealous of your wings...
Are you Archangel Nemesis's brother or somethin'? And you both got wings? Some families have all the luck...
Oh, sorry, I thought that's how genies work...
"Ultimate Gamer," you say? Well I guess I know your favorite Slipknot song: Insert Coin!... Which isn't a bad option, but like, c'mon, Unsainted is like right there.
"Ultimate Gamer," you say? Well I guess I know your favorite Slipknot song: Insert Coin!... Mine's Nero Forte, by the way.
Yo, it's Princess Kumatora! Awesome! It's been a while since I played Mo-- er, never mind. Probably shouldn't say that...
Don't worry, I don't expect ya to go easy on me just cuz it's my birthday. I don't even expect ya to know it's my birthday!
Guess whose birthday's today?... That's right, it's Suzuka Nakamoto's!... And mine too. How cool is that?
Can ya believe I share a birthday with Suzuka Nakamoto? Isn't that awesome? Also it's today, if ya didn't know. Don't worry, I don't expect any presents!
Fun fact, today's the day I started life! No, not my birthday -- today's the day I realized I wanted to become a rocker! I was alive before then, but I wasn't livin' until this day a few years ago!
Fun fact, on this day a few years ago, a great love was formed! I ain't talkin' about Valentine's Day, I'm talkin' about my love for guitar! This was the day I started really havin' fun with it!
Thanks, Nagisa. I love this skirt too. Aren't skirts just the best?
N-no no, it's fine. It's just, uh... I dunno. Ya sure ya don't find mine kinda... gross?
Nah, it ain't that I'm shielded from history, it's just that it doesn't stick. My head's all stuffed up with lyrics and tabs and junk that there's no room to remember history.
I don't just wanna fly, Leonie, I wanna fly with wings! Ridin' on somethin' or usin' a jetpack wouldn't be the same!
Oh, well, they kinda just... appeared one day. I wasn't in any accidents, and I didn't read from any special books... that I know of.
Oh, y'know, we jam, we play video games, we just generally hang out. Nothin' special, really.
You mean like venue security? That's the place's manager's business, not mine. I'm just talkin' personal security for me and my bandmates.

state.text: Gah ha! Don't let my terrible opener make ya think no one else around here can do better! My bandmate Charlotte could do way better than that if she were here!

case.state: Ya ever heard about that hero school, Nagisa? It can teach ya ways ya can be a hero without powers, if that's somethin' ya decide ya wanna be.
It's all good. I probably got some weird habits too that I don't realize no one else does.
I ain't about to gamble money. Pretty sure Charlotte would get mad at me for that, plus I don't got any cash on me right now anyway!
Oh, uh, okay. Sorry I couldn't help, I guess.
Oh, uh, yeah, but it's just a name. All my bandmates got stage names like that too. Our bassist is "Hidden Gem," our drummer is "Cult Classic," and our keyboardist is "Smash Hit."
Nah, it's this tortilla shell stuffed with meat and cheese and other stuff. The shell can be hard or soft, and the meat can be mild or spicy.

Sorry, I didn't mean to put down your gallerie's buffet, it's just caviar's expensive and cheese and crackers is more like a snack. I think of a meal as bein' somethin' more hearty, like steak and potatoes.
I'm, uh... not actually super familiar with that allegory, how's it apply to your current situation? It's about not knowin' how great somethin' you can't see can be, right? Somethin' like that?
I dunno if interactivity would make a gallery more fun for me...

Some other weird things I've heard of... Well, there's that robot that came to life cuz it was sick of bein' spare parts... there's that spider doll chick... and I'm still weirded out by that Wereshark chick.
I know, it's totally weird, right? Like, what's the difference? How is magic not just a super power? What makes what I do different than what some mage can do?
Ice powers are neat, but wings are so much more dope! Imagine a guitarist, up on stage, flyin' around while shreddin'! I wanna be that guitarist!
What good's predictin' the weather for? Can't ya just open up your weather app?
So what's some weird stuff that happens in your universe, Supernova?
I don't know much about it either! All I know is I can shoot ice, and some people can shoot more!
Gah ha ha! Told ya!
You're not really shreddin' yourself, you're shreddin' on your strings, which really just means "playin' really fast."
Sorta kinda. It's where my relatives live. My parents and I fly over to visit all the time!
Gah ha ha! Imagine bettin' your soul for noodle bread! It's like somethin' out of a comedy!
Eh, they're only mean if ya listen to 'em like they're direct at ya. They're really cathartic when ya imagine 'em bein' directed at your enemies.
You ever even try any western foods, Takatoshi? Like pizza, or one'a those fancy burgers with bacon and jalapeños on it? There's a ton of foods more tasty than yakisoba pan!
Yeah! Exactly!
I could see the video game hypnosis thing happenin' in my universe too, and maybe the cat army too, but sentient food? I think ya got me beat there.
Pffft. "I don't really have any cute ones." All skirts are cute skirts, my dude! What're some ones ya got?
See, and you thought ya didn't have any cute skirts! Those are definitely cute skirts. I bet they look great on ya!
Wha-? Hey! You asked, and I gave an honest answer! I like listenin' to whatever, and I like playin' whatever too!
I mean, I like pyrotechnics and junk as much as the next chick, but I ain't tryin' to be the next Dethklok, y'know? I don't want people to be afraid to go to my shows.
I can't exactly sing if I'm coughin'. Not to mention if I get throat cancer and lose my vocal cords. I'm already hard enough on my voice tryin' to do death growls...
Uh, Panty, we talkin' about the same Golden Glory's daughter? Y'know, Veronica Glory? I haven't heard anything about her workin' glory holes.
Gah ha ha! Don't worry, if masturbatin' were a sin, I would'a been struck down by now!
No offense, Cynthia, but maybe the flute'll work if ya know how to play it? Maybe ya need to play a sick flute solo to get Arceus to show up!
You could totally be a hero, Nagisa! You could learn to build robots or gadgets, or learn martial arts or weapons, or maybe even give yourself powers somehow!

Nah, I think I gotta disagree. I mean, experience is good for songs, but I think I could just as easily come up with a song by lookin' at some pictures of ruins or playin' a video game. Besides, I ain't even our lead writer.
Sure, sure, but it feels kinda... disrespectful to just... stare at the penis... I can literally just google the word "penis" if that's all I wanna do.
How powerful is this Giratina?... Actually, wait, I dunno how powerful the devil is, so I can't compare 'em... I can't imagine he's that powerful. He got beat by a kid with a fiddle.
What kinda music would they expect me to play at this Junior Cup? I've never played for a sportin' event before.

state.text: That's a good wish, Cynthia! Language really is a powerful thing. I feel lucky to have grown up in a bilingual household! It's fun helpin' out lost tourists in Japan, matawa nihongo o hanasu seiyo hito to tsunagaru!

case.state: Oh, I don't got any specific recommendations. Nature's all fine by me, but I'm more of a city gal.

Well, for me, rockin' is all about the music, it ain't about gettin' groupies. Not that I wouldn't like havin' maybe one groupie, or maybe a roadie, but I'm okay with not havin' any. It ain't a goal or anything.
We're, uh... We're not actually doin' all that good. We're still pretty small-time.
The devil lost a fiddle duel to a boy named Johnny cuz he was in a bind and way behind, so he bet a fiddle of gold against his soul cuz he thought he was better than him!
Well, I don't know anything about sport anthems, but inspirin' music is my specialty! Power metal all the way!

state.text: Anata mo nihongo ga hanasete bikkuri! Technically my "native tongue" is English, though. I only know Japanese cuz of family!

case.state: I hope ya got your money back for that fake flute. I know I'd be pissed if I bought somethin' that turned out to be fake.
I'm pretty sure DragonForce hasn't been knighted before. That would be kinda badass though...
Glad to know those Devil Fruits ain't toxic. I don't think I ate one, water feels great! I love takin' hot showers!

I dunno how much gold costs, so I dunno how valuable a gold fiddle would cost either. I don't think the fiddle was the point, though, I think Johnny just wanted to prove he's the best there's ever been.
I-I've never been with guys like that, Kumatora. It's just, y'know, TV and stuff has always told me that guys only last like a minute.
Don't even sweat it. Not everyone grows up in a situation where they get to learn other languages very well. Most people only got the one!
I've heard of HP, but probably not in the way you're expectin'.
Sounds about right. I think things work like that in my world too, except ya lose energy when ya heal, not when ya get hurt... I think. I dunno, I'm not a doctor.
I'm pretty sure Archangel Nemesis ain't a real angel, Pit, just some dude who's got wings! Her halo was fake as heck!
Dunno about anyone else, but I don't gotta do that. Everything is either rockin', or somethin' I gotta do before rockin', so there's always motivation!
Oh, I just meant that in general. All those super heroes out there ain't special just cuz some got powers, y'know? But anyway, what do ya wanna be when ya finish school?
Uh, I dunno, hard to say without knowin' what your universe has got. Ever try tacos?

It's a pretty normal dimension, I guess? Magic exists, but ya gotta have like special blood or somethin', but people do got non-magic powers that are kinda like magic anyway... which doesn't really make sense...
With some of the things I've seen, I could believe there's talkin' animals in this universe! Apparently there's a crocodile smart enough to make himself a robot suit!
Mmm... Nope, don't see one. Should I take a closer look, or ya good...?
I love playin' guitar, does that count...?
Geez, ~player~, if you're gonna jerk off, stop playin' coy and whip it out!
I really like watermelon-flavored things and anything with chocolate. But really, as long as it ain't cherry-flavored, I'll eat anything!
Gah ha! I haven't killed anything bigger than a spider!... Although I did kill a daddy longlegs when we toured through Texas...
Strip poker? No. Regular poker?... Also no. Keh heh... I ain't a card game person, so I really only play Hanafuda with my family.
I got a husky named Pearl, and my aunt and uncle got a cat named Kibo that I see whenever we visit family. I love 'em both lots!
Oh, uh, I dunno, I'm not from around here. We can probably find some abandoned building or somethin' if we look hard enough, I guess.
Nah, I ain't much of a sports chick. If we're gonna compete at somethin', I'd rather it be a guitar duel!
I'll listen to anything, but I'm all about that power metal! Let's hear ya shred, dude!
... Tomatoes...?
Oh, well, uh, I dunno about how good I'd look if I had my glasses on. Not sure they'd fit my look, anyway...
Oh, but see, the thing about the devil is he wants everyone's souls. It's, like, an ego thing or somethin'. It's good that there's nothin' he can tempt ya with, though!
Sorry I wasn't clearer, Nagisa. I meant is there anything that's, like, a privilege ya got that ya wish ya could trade for another?
Huh, dang, singin' powers must be more common than I thought...
... Oh, I see, ya meant you'd duel the devil for peace. Huh. Well that's cool and all, but I dunno that the devil would give ya that. It's supposed to be about temptation and stuff, I think.
Shreddin' ain't painful. Ya build up calluses way before ya get on that skill level.
Thanks for the offer, Penny, but it ain't the same if I ain't the one doin' the flyin'.

You totally should be allowed to choose who ya are, Penny! It's not like bein' who ya wanna be and keepin' people safe are mutually exclusive! I still save people if I can, I just don't go outta my way for it.
Selfish...? I mean, I guess it is selfish, but there are already tons of super heroes out there. Is it really bad that I ain't one of 'em?
That scale ain't based on rockers, they're all, like, historical Mesopotamian figures or somethin'. I don't really know, history was my worst subject, but I know 'em from a song!
I wanna do good death growls cuz they're metal, that's why!
That's not really how it works, Penny. You're supposed to duel the devil for somethin' more, uh... tangible, I guess? Although I guess JB and KG dueled him to get him to go back to hell, so...
Uh, I dunno... I guess it'd be pretty sweet to talk to my dog.
I know I gotta use the back of my throat more. Kara told me that too, I just dunno how to do that.
C'mon, Saki, ya know "Not-Electric-Guitar Mood" is cheatin'. That's like sayin' your favorite emotion is "not feelin' any emotion."
What would an idol know about death growls? Can ya even do a death growl with your synth voice?
Don'tcha think our styles are too different for that to work out, Miku? I think your usual crowd would hate my band.
You play guitar, Miku? How's that work?
I'm sure too, Miku, it's just... a lot harder when ya got a physical limitation stoppin' ya, y'know?... Oh I guess ya wouldn't know cuz you're a hologram...
I got glasses, Miku, I just don't wear 'em cuz glassess ain't part of my look!
Bandmates gotta be close, Miku, or else it ain't fun. Ya don't wanna end up hatin' the songs ya make together and eventually breakin' up.
Not literal metal, ya silly robot, metal like the music! Metal singers do death growls all the time!
It's all good, Penny. Ya didn't hurt my feelin's, ya just gave me somethin' to think about!
Ah, sorry, I can't donate. I'm on a pretty strict budget, myself.
Wait wait, notoriety? Why ya gotta assume my band's bad?
Oh, ya know, it's just a natural way of expressin' how much ya like a song. It's like instinct.
You don't know apps, Nami? The little programs on your phone that do cool things for ya?... Do you have a phone...?
I mean, I can make things outta ice and make it snow indoors and stuff, so it's not like ice makes for bad shows. It's just not the kinda spectacle I wanna make, y'know?
It's funny, Colress, the league I was in actually had a lotta women in it! It wasn't a women's league or somethin' like that, it just happened to have a lotta women!
Well, I don't know any jigs, but I know a couple shanties. Dunno how much the dudes in Bilgewater would like "Oh! Majinai" style songs, though...
No no, er... Well, probably not. I dunno. I guess I wouldn't know. It's probably fine, if we keep the group size down and be respectful to each other...
Most people got phones, but it's okay ya don't got one, Nami. I bet ya could afford a pretty great one with your pirate money, though!
Yeah!... I mean that won't get me wings, but still...

Okay so I ain't good at death growls, but I ain't gonna get good by not doin' 'em!

So those Devil Fruit things, they're not toxic, right? I'm not gonna die, right...?
A bow ain't an instrument, Lyralei! A bow is half an instrument. Ya need a violin or cello or somethin'!
You were holdin' up two fingers, Lyralei! I ain't blind, just a little near-sighted. I can't read things unless they're close enough.
"Being fantastic," eh? I think that'd apply to a lot of metal songs, especially power metal! Operation Ground And Pound by DragonForce comes to mind immediately as an example!

Where you come from must have a really lose definition of "hero," Lyralei! I ain't a hero just cuz I got powers. It's what I do with 'em that would determine that, if I did much with 'em to begin with!
We could play acoustically if ya really wanna hire us, Lyralei. It wouldn't sound as good, but we could do it.
Don'tcha think if I knew what tricks I'd fall for, I wouldn't fall for 'em to begin with?
I'd make a great wife cuz I'd be loyal, affectionate, and I'd make every moment a fun one!
"Not everyone," eh? Then what do ya call this?... Seriously, is this PSI? I dunno where my powers come from.
Aw, I could never pick! I love my dog Pearl, but I love the cat that my aunt and uncle have too!

state.text: What you need, Reimu, is some low-growlin' black metal. Somethin' like Gently by Slipknot. Y'know, like "Shut the fuck uuuup! Grrrrrrah!" Cough cough! 'Scuse me...

case.state: I ain't dyin', Hu! That's my death growl! Y'know, like death metal singers do!

condition.saying: Even t-though I-I'm not hurt anymore. I-I still wear these bandages because I find them... comforting. I-Is that weird?

case.state: Nah, I think I get it. It's like when ya cut your hand, so ya put a bandaid on, and even though you don't need it once the bleedin' stops, you keep it on anyway 'til it heals all the way.

condition.saying: Um... um, um I-I went to the trouble of memorizing 5,000 different poker strategies. B-But now that we're playing, I-I can't remember any of them!

case.state: Gah ha! Yep, that's just how it is! It's like when ya study real hard for a test, but then when it's right in front of ya, you can't remember a thing!

condition.saying: Hm... I wonder what sorts of drinks they have here. It's important to stay hydrated after all.

condition.saying: U-Um, would anyone want me to buy them a drink? I-It would only be fair after you let me play this game with you.

condition.saying: W-We get our clothes back after the game, right? This isn't s-some type of trick?

case.state: I sure hope so! I'm gonna need this outfit later! And if we don't, I'm gonna have to freeze so faces off for not tellin' us! And then we'll steal our clothes back!

condition.saying: T-This game is really fun. I-I'm glad none of you mind playing it with me.

case.state: Of course! Why would we mind? It's not like you're obnoxious or anything!
Ya mean that feelin' ya get when ya look someone in the eyes, Trixie? That's, like, any metal love song! Either the person's into it, or it'll make 'em wanna run!
Nope, I am that friend! I don't think things through all that often, and it's my bandmates who gotta tell me why my idea was a bad one!

Sounds kinda like Charlotte. She's always puttin' us before herself. Like, our RV only has three beds, so she sleeps on the floor. We try to repay her in kind, like makin' sure she's got a good sleepin' bag.
Usin' villains you've beat makes a lot more sense, ~other~! The Mesopotamian scale is literally just how attractive we think the animated dudes from a music video are, so it's pretty arbitrary!

It's not like I don't help people, ~other~. I just don't wanna make it my whole life, y'know? Like if someone showed up right now to mug us, I'd freeze his hands together, but I'm gonna leave burnin' buildin's and bank robberies to dudes who know what they're doin'.
That's the thing, ~other~, Tenacious D didn't beat the devil! They lost, and the devil shot lightning at 'em, but then JB's guitar reflected back at him a broke his horn!
I'm still tryin' to get good at death growls, but that's why our drummer takes over singin' sometimes. She's way better at that kinda stuff!
I dunno how fun I'd be to drum-off with, ~other~. I only know pretty basic stuff.
"Faster of Puppets?" Is that the one where it's Master of Puppets but it keeps getting faster?
There was a spider-person wrestler? Who was it? Was it Spydoll? I bet she could kick some serious butt!
Oh, I just clean myself up and carry on with my day. Or if it's night, I just clean up and go to bed.
Sure! As long as ya don't call me, like, a slur or somethin', whatever works for you works for me too!
Hmm... No, I don't think I do. I'm a pretty open book.
Honestly? I know I gotta avoid cigarette smoke to protect my voice, but I kinda like the smell.
No, not at all! Ya can't get smart without bein' stupid first!
Oh yeah, bein' multilingual is fun! I love when I'm in Japan and tourists come up to me like "Uh, konichiwa, uh, day-- uh, deki masuu" and I'm like "Dude, it's okay, I speak English!"
Ugh, yeah, I hate that too! I mean not enough to smash toes, but yeah! I get wantin' to fit in, but don't sacrifice your own free will for it!
Those are so freakin' metal, dude! I mean metaphorically, not just literally...

I eat a lotta hot stuff -- real hot, not just pirikara -- so it's hard to pick one "hottest." At a certain point, it kinda just goes from "hot" to "ow my freakin' face" and then it all blends together, y'know?
Eh, I dunno. There's nothin' I'd do if I were gigantic for a day. I'd probably just spend the whole time tryin' not to break somethin' or hurt someone!

condition.saying: It's either really cute or really annoying how much some teachers actually care. I keep going back and forth.

case.state: I think part of carin' about someone is knowin' when to give 'em their space, so when ya find it annoyin' how much they care, ya gotta tell 'em!

condition.saying: Are any of you actually a hundred percent set on what you like in a girl... or a guy? Just so many nice traits to choose from, ya know.

case.state: Gah ha! I feel that! I mostly just want somone who's fun to be around. Everything else is just like there's no real wrong answer!

condition.saying: Suzu's done a pretty good job about making me feel bad for getting into fights... but maybe I should just commit and be a boxer or something.

case.state: You should! It's a pretty good feelin' when ya beat someone in the ring! I bet it feels even better when ya actually know how to fight!
Ya think so? I've always thought anal sounds kinda painful. Plus, like, why would I assume it'd feel better in my butt?
Huh? What do ya mean? Nothin's off about me, I am how I always am.

Uh, Yuno, ya know Through The Fire And Flames was originally performed on real guitars, right? All of Guitar Hero's songs were. It's pretty common for guitarists to cover that song just to prove their skill.
I mean, loyalty's pretty important to everyone, right? Ya wanna be able to trust the dudes around ya.
Ya try herbal teas yet? Usually helps me when I'm jet-lagged.
Not much, just someone who's fun to be around. I ain't picky!... Can't say the same about my classmates, though...
I like trains the best. It's a nice fast, smooth ride. Seats are usually pretty comfy, too.

condition.saying: I'm not sure what club I'd choose if I wasn't a Student Council member. Perhaps the Literature Club?

condition.saying: I always like sitting in on the Othello Club. It's really a deceptively simple game, with a lot of strategy deep down.

case.state: Oh man, I love Othello! Too bad my school didn't have an Othello Club!

condition.saying: I don't know how the Occult Club was approved, if they only have two members. I didn't file their paperwork either... they just handed me a signed document, and that was that.

case.state: Gah ha! It's almost like their papers were filed... by a ghost! Whoa!

condition.saying: It was interesting visiting the Athletics Club. I considered joining it at some point, but I'd always been busy.

case.state: My school had one'a those clubs. They seemed like really supportive dudes, so I bet the ones at your school are pretty cool to hang with too.

condition.saying: Um... not sure if anyone cares, but my name is literally just Japanese for "girl". It was supposed to be a placeholder until my parents came up with a better name, but they... didn't.

case.state: Fuck that noise! You oughta go change your name to somethin' badass, like "Tomoe" or "Akane!" No one should be stuck with a stupid name just cuz their parents were bad name-givers!
That's a neat scope-thingy ya got there, ~player~. Are ya checkin' our power levels or somethin'? What's mine? Probably not all that high, right, cuz all I got is ice?
Oh, right, I forgot, this outfit's by a company called "Brainfreeze." This is there logo here, on this collar dealy. We got a deal with 'em cuz of my ice powers!
How's the crowd feelin' about this game so far, eh?! Pretty great, right?!
This is one killer match, am I right, y'all?!
It's your birthday, eh? Happy freakin' birthday to ya!
