How's the crowd feelin' about this game so far, eh?!
I've never been arrested before, so I'd be okay with gettin' busted for public nudity here. Having an arrest record would be pretty punk, but I ain't about actual criminal activity, y'know?
Gah! Beach shows! Why didn't I think of it before! How often do ya see a metal band play on the beach, eh? Never! That's why it's brilliant!
Oh shit, I just realized I'm gonna see boys jack off to each other! In person! And maybe more! Hell yeah!
So it's just us chicks for this, eh? That's cool. I welcome all audiences!
Ladies' night tonight, eh? No complaints here!
Hey, fair warning, dudes, I got ice powers, so don't try anything funny, 'kay?
Fair warning, dudes, try anything funny with me and I'll whip out the Flash-Freeze Solo on ya!
Just us, eh? Good thing I'm used to playin' to small crowds! Gah ha!... Eh, made myself a little sad...
It's pretty cool you became a superhero. I got powers too, but I don't let 'em rule my life, y'know? I wanna be a rocker, so that's what I'm gonna be!
It's pretty cool you became a superhero. I could'a been one too, but there are plenty of 'em out there already, and I just wanna rock.
It's pretty cool y'all became superheroes. I got powers too, but I don't let 'em rule my life, y'know? I wanna be a rocker, so that's what I'm gonna be!
It's pretty cool y'all became superheroes. I could'a been one too, but there are plenty of 'em out there already, and I just wanna rock.
It's actually kinda amazing that no one's lost yet! Guess that's gonna change in a moment!
I didn't realize how long this would take. Good thing we don't got any gigs today... or tomorrow... or -- I should stop talking...
Didn't realize this was gonna take so long. Lemme take a sec to text Charlotte. If I don't, she's gonna worry.
Geez, there are some really great songs that are like seven minutes long, but this is ridiculous. This game's goin' long, is what I'm sayin'.

Y'know what I really like about metal? The guitar can express many different emotions while still soundin' metal. Happy, sad, and obviously angry! Name a mood and I can name a metal song that covers it!
I'm cool with ya takin' pictures, but please don't share 'em online. I don't wanna be known as "that guitarist who strips."
♪Can you see all of me, walk into my mystery, step inside and hold on for dear life!♪
... Why'd it take me so long to realize I need black nail polish. Like seriously, I should be ashamed to not have any.
Yo, I really need some black nail polish. I mean, punk can be punk without nail polish, but I think it looks rad, therefore, I need it.
Ugh, now that I think about it, I gotta get some black nail polish. It's pretty much a crime that I don't have any.
Now we can achieve hadaka no tsukiai! That's where ya become friends while naked, if ya didn't know.
I dunno about anyone else, but this ain't awkward for me in the slightest! I've been to a bathhouse on more than one occasion!
Oh crap! I just realized how close this match is gonna be!
Charlotte's our bassist, by the way. She's also basically our manager, since she books the gigs, drives the RV, and all that other junk.
Kara's our drummer, by the way. She can also sing black metal way better than I can, so sometimes we swap around so she can take the mic!
Emily's our keyboardist, by the way. Or in the case of songs that don't got keyboard in them, she's the chick who hits a beer keg with a baseball bat!
I'm Critical Darling, by the way, but you can call me just "Darling," or "CD," or whatevs.
I'm Critical Darling, by the way. I mean, that's my stage name, not my actual name, but you're more likely to know me by my stage name!
I'm Critical Darling, by the way. Y'know, the NHBF Wrestling chick... that lost to La Dragonesa in the semi-finals...
Y'know that the OG Muppets used to wreck their sets at the end of each show? That's pretty metal! Their slapstick can also be pretty metal sometimes too!

Jim Henson was pretty rad for being an epitome of the true artistic nature of puppetry. His passion got 'em there, and that's pretty punk! Also he had this saying, "better to ask for forgiveness than permission," which is also pretty punk!
Don't worry, I ain't gonna sing ya some cheesy Christmas songs. I don't like the ones with lyrics, anyway!

I did mention that I wrestled in NHBF, right? Well, less "wrestled" and more "shot ice at people." I lost super bad to La Dragonesa in the semi-finals, though, cuz she actually wrestles and could melt my ice...

I did mention that I wrestled in NHBF, right? The super-powered wrestlin' tournament? I thought it was a good way to make my powers worth somethin'. I came in third, but the prize money was still nice, so I got what I wanted out of it.
Ugh, geez, I think I need some water...
Ugh, geez, I need to ♪grab for some water! But I'm that pill that's to jagged to swallow!♪ Cough! But seriously, I need some water...
Oh, right, I should explain, that "Gilgamesh to Hammurabi" scale thing is something I made up with my bandmates. "Gilgamesh" is bad, and then it goes "Ashurbanipal," "Sargon," and then "Hammurabi."
I gotta admit, though, as much as I appreciate my powers, I still wish I at least could shoot fire instead of ice. That'd be way more metal...
Did'ja ever heard about those dudes that have singing powers? Like, they make stuff happen when they sing? I'd still rather have wings, but that sounds pretty dope anyway!

state.text: By the way, I don't mean to sound like I don't appreciate my powers! They work great for special effects during shows -- which is double-great cuz Charlotte won't let us use pyrotechnics!

case.state: If any of y'all need to cool down, just let me know! There's no limit to how much ice I can make!... Probably!
You haven't lived until you've heard Emily sing Raining Blood in her cutest voice!
Oh, Emily can also play bass, which is great cuz it lets Charlotte pick up rhythm guitar for some songs!
Some might call Charlotte a buzzkill cuz she doesn't let us use pyrotechnics and she got mad at me for stage-divin' and stuff like that, but I know she's just lookin' out for us.

Oh, and Charlotte can also play guitar, which you might expect out of a bassist, but not everyone takes the time to learn both properly. I'm better at shreddin' than she is, but she's got a better understandin' of chords.
Kara's like the chillest person I've ever met, which is funny cuz I'm the one with the ice powers.
Now that I think about it, Kara's the strongest one of us in the band. She can lift Emily up over her head!
♪It's summertime luh-uh-loving, it's loving in the summertime!♪ Gah! Dang it, Summertime Loving, Loving in the Summer (Time), get outta my head!
Don't worry, I'm sure you'll see somethin' from me too soon enough. I ain't good at any card games, let alone poker.
Weird how this would be less awkward if I was naked. There ain't a lotta things ya can say that about!
C'mon! Ya wanna see me naked, ya gotta work for it! Or at least work harder than ya are! I ain't about to throw the game for ya -- that'd be too easy!
So, uh... like I was sayin' before, I'm into toys, but I don't got any yet. I'm open to some recommendations, if ya got some.
Bet ya didn't expect Rainbow Connection from me, eh? That's what those lyrics about stars was from. Believe it or not, but Muppets are pretty metal, and Jim Henson was pretty punk too!
Don't get me wrong, though, Serj has an amazing voice, and he's clearly passionate about music. I just don't hear that same passion in his solo stuff, I guess.
Can ya believe some people say Lonely Day is System of a Down's worst song, by the way? I love that song! Who cares if it's message is much more on the nose than usual?
You dudes oughta come to our show tonight! It ain't gonna be Christmas-themed, but I'm gonna make it snow anyway cuz I always do that!

I was actually followin' Nero Forte's story on the news, up to his death. He could control the elements, make clones, and teleport all by singin'! Pretty freakin' metal! He went crazy and murdered a bunch of people after his girlfriend was assassinated, though... which I guess is still kinda metal.
♪Tape has brightening arm connect! Self-paint lever itching does!♪
Shaving copter anymore! Weld crat tonsil speep enact!
♪Uncle fourteen marching flame! Sleep expensive cloud enjoy!♪
Gurb long trom flom dim fim lim! Dog dog dog dog dog dog dog!
♪Why do you like playin' around with, my narrow scope of reality? I can feel it all start slippin' away!♪
See but I don't get it, don't you think maybe we could put it on credit? Don't you think it can take control when I don't let it? I get stupified! It's all the same you say!

Oh, in case you were wonderin', I dunno where my powers came from or how they work, I just know I can make ice appear with my mind. Pretty sure some people are just born with "gifts" like that, y'know?
As much as I love Through The Fire And Flames, though, I think there is one DragonForce song that's better: Cry For Eternity. That song is so bonkers! I don't think I could ever play it!
♪It's summertime and you know what that means, gonna head down to the beach, gonna do some beachy things!♪
♪It's summertime, it feels just right, gonna gather all my friends and we'll party through the night!♪
♪It's summertime luh-uh-loving, it's loving in the summertime! It's summertime luh-uh-loving, oh baby why can't you be mine?♪
Not gettin' cold is definitely one'a the great things about my powers. I can dress however I want in cold weather, and I don't gotta worry about havin' hot water for showers!
♪I~t's your birth-day toda~y!♪
♪One more year closer to dying, rotting organs ripping grinding! Biological discordance, birthday equals self abhorrence!♪
♪One more year of further suffering, there's no point of fucking bluffing! Open up your DETHDAY present, it's a box of fucking nothing!♪

♪You're older than you've ever been, and now you're even older, and now you're even older, and now you're even older! You're older than you've ever been, and now you're even older, and now you're older still!♪
♪Time... is marching on!... And time... is still marching on!♪
Oh, uh, hope ya don't mind, most of the birthday songs I know are existential.
I wonder how many dudes with powers out there use their powers to pleasure themselves. I... will neither confirm or deny that I am one of them...
I'm, uh... I'm actually really into chest-play, so I hope my boobs look like they're worth playin' with.
Y'know, I actually don't have any tops that are... any more revealin' than a t-shirt, really. I've just... never really been one for showin' off skin.
I know all those dudes ya hear about with superpowers go hero and stuff, but I'm the kinda chick who doesn't let somethin' like powers steer her away from what she really wants in life!
I know most dudes with powers become heroes, ya hear about that all the time, but I never wanted to be one. There are plenty of other heroes out there already anyway, so I'm free to rock!
I'm sure all the dudes ya know with powers became superheroes, but I'd probably just get myself killed doin' that. Besides, bein' a superhero won't fund my rockin'!

Oh, in case ya needed to know, I got ice powers. Y'all probably know, like, at least three dudes with way cooler powers than mine, though, right? And that's why they're probably super heroes and I ain't.
Not to brag, but I can play, like, half of Through The Fire And Flames on a real guitar. My hand always cramps up and stops me, though... But the half I can play is sure to blow ya away!

Hey, would any of y'all bet your soul and duel the devil for somethin'? I wouldn't! Not even for wings!... Well maybe... No! Well... No! No, definitely not! If JB and KG couldn't beat him, I sure can't!
Oh, by the way, if it wasn't already clear, I really wish I had wings. I have ice powers, but I'd trade them for wings if I could. Any of you got anything like that in your lives?

It's pretty obvious that I like purple, but y'know what other color I like? Slime green! I would'a had some slime green accents on this outfit if I had anything in that color, but I'm lucky enough that I had what I'm wearin' to begin with!
Any of y'all happen to be lookin' for an alternative band? We're still lookin' to book some gigs.
By the way, I ain't just a guitarist. I'm also a drummer and keyboardist! Any of y'all know how to play anything?
I know the whole "topless with suspenders" look is hot, but these suspenders are strictly for danglin' at my sides!
We've never had anyone flash us during a concert, by the way. Our songs just don't inspire toplessness, I guess!
I'm kinda bummed that the magic solos from Brütal Legend aren't real, but at least I got my own version of the Face Melter -- I call it the "Flash-Freeze Solo!"
Man, I wanna get a steel guitar sometime. That'd be sweet... I can't even explain how much I want to try shreddin' on one, it's not even funny...
See, headbangin' ain't just in the head. You also gotta throw your spine into it too. Like this!
... So why did Constantinople become Istanbul...? Ah, I guess ya only know if you're Turkish, huh...?
Hey, did'ja know The Devil Went Down To Georgia has a sequel? The Devil Comes Back To Georgia! He comes back, and he loses again!
Y'know what I hate? Instrument-shamin'. Like, who cares if ya play the bagpipes or the accordion or whatevs. There's no such thing as a "bad instrument!"
It's kinda funny; I like Daron Malakian's solo work, but not so much Serj Tankian's solo work. Clearly, Daron's the part of System of a Down I enjoy!
I know some people are mad at DragonForce for that time they had a bunch of technical difficulties, but I forgive 'em. I mean, it's not like they chose to have tech issues, y'know?
Y'know, I don't envy Babymetal; singin', dancin', wearin' those probably-heavy outfits under like a bazillion hot stage lights. I actually feel bad for 'em! I hope they're at least havin' fun!

Do ya think They Might Be Giants still has Dial-A-Song up and runnin'? I mean I know they got the website now, but do ya think they still got the tape machine? They probably still got the tape machine.
Did'ja know Tom Morello was in one'a the Iron Man movies? He's in the first one, in that scene where Tony Stark starts usin' the Mark I to escape his kidnappers!
Y'know what I never learned? How to understand a conductor. I mean, I'll probably never need to know, but I just don't get it. All I see is a bunch of wavin'.
Me and my bandmates like to have super open rehearsals, where people can come watch us jam and do covers and stuff for free. That was one'a the promotion ideas I came up with.
Isn't it funny how I know three songs called "Spiders?" Four if ya count "Spiderwebs!" I oughta write a song called "Spiders" too just cuz!

I don't really get why so many people who know Chop Suey can't understand the lyrics. "Wake up! Grab a brush and put on a little make up!" It ain't hard! Sugar, though, that's understandable... or not, I guess! Gah ha ha!

Yo, shoutouts to John Dolmayan, System of a Down's drummer. Drummers don't get enough credit, and System of a Down undoubtably wouldn't be the same with him! And if ya dont agree, try listin' to BYOB without the drums!
I never got why some songs end with a fade out. Like, I hear ya still playin', stop crankin' it down, I wanna hear it!
... Why do they always send the poor? I get presidents not fightin' the wars, but why do they always -- oh, ooooh, never mind...
Do ya think anyone ever explained to Jack Black what Chop Suey's lyrics mean? Cuz I don't care what he says, those lyrics aren't dumb and meaningless.

I think it's funny how in the Wayne's World movie, Wayne goes from a white Lyon to a white Stratocaster. Like sure, it's an upgrade, but if ya don't know much about guitars, it just looks like he goes from one white S-type to another!

Isn't it funny how the version of The Devil Went Down To Georgia they used for Guitar Hero III was made for it, yet they still had to take out the word "bitch!" Like, why'd they have that line like that if they couldn't keep it?
I don't get why Down With The Sickness is Disturbed's most popular song. It's not even their best song, and sure as heck ain't the only one that's got a "wah-ah-ah-ah" in it.
This ice guitar I make doesn't actually work, by the way. It'd be so rad if I could make a workin' one, though!

Ya know what I really respect? Daron Malakian's ability to sing and play that riff in BYOB during the ♪Dancin' in the desert blowin' up the sunshine♪ part. The lyrics and strummin' are at two different tempos, and I can't do both at once!
Okay, I gotta admit, I wanna get a shamisen -- that "Japanese banjo" ya might've heard before. I got some ideas for songs inspired by the Yoshida Brothers I think would sound dope.

Here's a fun fact I learned recently. Y'know that Blue song? "Da ba dee da ba die?" Some people think it's about depression, but it's actually about how ya pick your own lifestyle. They picked the color blue at random!
I gotta say, I love Marko Hietala's vocals. Nightwish fans always argue like "Tarja's the best!" "No, Anette's the best!" and I'm like nah dude, Marko's the best!
... Hey, I bet if we can find a TV, we can catch a rerun of one'a my NHBF matches right now!
Don't expect to see my bandmates naked too, by the way! I ain't about to ask 'em to do this with me!
I ain't about to do a gig naked, but if I brought my guitar, I'd totally play somethin' for ya, if ya wanted.
I ain't, like, a nudist or whatevs, but it would be nice to be able to do more things naked. I dunno what I'd do naked, but it'd just be nice to have the option.
I'm not even gonna look at what I got. It doesn't matter anyway!
Good hand, bad hand, none of it matters when ya plan to get naked!
Maybe I should'a brought my guitar, so I can practice during the low points...?
♪This song doesn't have any words but these ones! And these ones! And these ones! And these ones! And these ones!♪
♪Minotaur-taur, tiny minotaur-taur, little minotaur-taur, mini minotaur-taur! Minotaur-taur, tiny minotaur-taur, little minotaur-taur, mini minotaur-taur!♪
♪Chicken nugget biscuit, nugget in a biscuit! Nugget, biscuit, nugget in a biscuit!♪ Dang, made myself hungry...
Who was it that sang that song that goes like ♪You got to know when to hold 'em, know when to fold 'em?♪ Ya think that guy ever comes around here?
I bet Kiss would be pretty fun at one'a these games. Basically all their songs are about sex and partyin' and stuff... or so I'm told. I only know the one song by them...
♪Somebody once asked could I spare some change for gas, I need to get myself away from this place! I said no!♪ Gah ha ha ha! That's way funnier to me than "they don't stop comin'!"
Such a shame they closed Hard Rock Park. I wanted to go and see how many references I could get...
Did'ja ever hear about Golden Glory's daughter? I hear she's workin' hard to be a great hero in her own right. Apparently she didn't inherit any powers, so she's workin' really hard! Mad respect!
Did'ja hear how that Raven von Grimblade guy is workin' on goin' from villain to hero? Apparently he realized his powers don't dictate his path in life. We're kinda alike in that regard!
Did'ja hear about that Natasha Cerebellum chick? I heard she cut off her arms on purpose to replace 'em with robot ones. That's pretty metal!
I heard recently that there's this shark chick who's been goin' around robbin' banks. A shark robbin' banks! What a world we live in!

I heard there's this chick whose only power is super strength, which apparently isn't all that great without super endurance and stuff, so she's buildin' herself a power armor set. I think that's pretty cool of her!
Did'ja ever hear about that Lucky Seven guy? That dude with the belt that randomly transforms him? Ya gotta be pretty crafty with a belt like that, since ya gotta make do with what the belt gives ya.
I heard that there's this dragon chick that they tried to lock up but she broke out, but she couldn't break her leg cuff so she goes around hoppin' everywhere!
Y'know, as much as I don't wanna become a hero, I think it'd be rad to go to hero school to learn to make robots from Dr. Imahara. There's probably a ton of cool stage stuff you can do with robots!
Really, it's a shame there ain't more super-powered rockers out there. That'd be dope!
Y'know the best part about havin' powers like mine? I can make it snow whenever I want! But that's only the best thing cuz ya need more than ice to make ice cream...
My favorite thing I've ever done with my powers was that time I made giant ice gauntlets to thrash my opponent with. It felt so badass!

Y'know how people always ask couples "Oh, when are you gettin' married? When are you havin' kids?" Having a super power's kinda like that. People are always like "Oh, so you're gonna become a super hero?" Glad y'all aren't like that.
Hey, if your boobs could play music, what do ya think they'd sound like? I think mine would sound like a sweet bassline.
If ya could trade your boobs for a dick, would ya do it? I think it'd be fun to try out havin' a dick, but I like havin' boobs too much to give 'em up for good.
Sure does feel good to let your boobs free for a bit, am I right?
Ya might think I know a song for this, but nah. I ain't much of a "party song" kinda chick.
Must be pretty great bein' an exhibitionist when ya can turn invisible. You'd get to walk around naked all ya want and not get caught!
If ya had the power to duplicate yourself, would ya screw yourself, literally? I probably wouldn't... Although, an extra pair of hands would be nice...
Man, imagine jillin' with telekinesis. I bet that'd be sweet! I bet it'd be like real sex, but by yourself!
Is it weird to have a fetish for somethin' you've never tried before? Cuz, like, I think I'm into toys, but I don't actually own any, and... i-is it too early to be talkin' fetishes...?
So what's it like havin' a penis? I bet it's kinda like havin' boobs, but they're attached to your hip, and also get hard when you're turned on, right?
Has anyone ever told ya what your dick tastes like? I think I heard someone say they taste salty -- or was that the balls...?
Hey, do ya have, like, a preference on what body part ya cum on? I dunno if I'd let a guy cum on my face, but I'd let him cum on my chest. I bet it'd feel pretty good...

By the way, if you were wonderin', my chest-play fetish doesn't get me turned on by wearin' a bra or whatevs just cuz they're touchin' my boobs. Clothes feel too "normal" to be sexy, y'know what I mean?
I, uh... didn't come here specifically hopin' someone would play with my boobs, but... if someone wanted to...
♪Who says that every wish, would be heard and answered, when wished on a morning star? Somebody thought of that, and someone believed it, look what it's done so far!♪
I fought this one dude who likes to dress like the grim reaper. Which is like, fine, but not a good idea for fightin'! His line of sight was so thin, it was easy to catch him off guard!

My first opponent in the ring was this zombie school girl. Seemed like an easy one, but she could take a beatin', and she got me real good right in the eye! I figured she'd be fine if I froze her solid, so I did, and that's how I won!
I fought against this one chick who had these big metal gauntlets. Once I started fightin' fire with fire -- well actually ice -- she was a piece of cake!
Oh, by the way, I'm not, like, contracted with NHBF or anything. I just did the one open tournament. They rerun those things for so long, people don't know I'm not fightin' there anymore.
This line should make me throw the game when the player is trailin' behind me by a couple layers.
This line should make me stop throwin' the game once I'm a layer away from the player.
This line should make me get really good at poker so I can't lose more than the player when I'm bein' a brat.
This should make me totally bomb once the player is outta layers if I'm actin' like a brat for 'em.
Hi, Corgi! Don't worry about this line, it's just settin' Kumatora's label to "Tora" cuz she liked my suggestion!
This line unlocks my Dragon Grandpa collectible for playin' with me on Ibuki Mioda's birthday. Can't imagine most people'll unlock it this way, but it'll be a fun surprise anyway!
Am I doin' good, ~player~? I hope I'm doin' good!
Am I a good girl, ~player~?
It feels pretty good, throwin' the game for my ~player~.
Yes! I get to take off more for my ~player~!
Losin' is what good girls do, right? Therefore, I totally am one!... Wait, sorry, was that oversteppin', ~player~?
No matter what happens, the choker stays on. You're into that, right, ~player~?
I'm gonna lose the best and become ~player~'s favorite!
No one's gonna stop me from becomin' ~player~'s favorite!
Well, alright, I guess I'll take somethin' off while ~player~ is watchin'.
Whatevs. ~player~ still ain't gonna beat me! I'm still ahead!
Fine, I'll take off one thing. Happy, ~player~?
You owe me for this one, ~player~!
I'm gonna get ya back for this one, ~player~!
Somehow I feel this is your fault, ~player~!
At least I'm still doin' better than ~player~. Gah ha ha!
Ugh, does ~player~ have to watch this time?... Fine...
Dang it! I ain't supposed to be losin' more than ~player~!
It's not fair! ~player~'s supposed to be the one losin'!
Whatevs! I'm sure ~player~'s still gonna lose too!
You'd better, like, buy me dinner or somethin' after this, ~player~!
The heck? How am I doin' worse than ~player~?
I-it's fine. I just wasn't tryin', that's all. I'm gonna go all out now!
I can't keep losin' to ~player~ like this...
Are you cheatin' or somethin', ~player~? You're probably cheatin'...
Eh, yes and no. We play at small places a lot, but strip poker's a first.
Oh, this is a shirt for one'a my favorite bands, Flaming Joy! I guess it is kinda ironic I wear it!
I mean, sometimes, but aren't there plenty of super hero dudes out there already? I don't think I'm needed out there.
Geez, if that's how you're gonna be right outta the gate, I ain't even gonna bother with ya. This place ain't payin' me enough to deal with toxic buttmunches -- it ain't payin' me at all!
Don't worry, I ain't gonna rock ya 'til you're ugly. I don't even got my guitar with me!
Oh man, space rockers? They must be pretty rad, eh? What're they like?
I don't really know. They kinda just showed up one day. I wasn't in any accidents or anything, so I was probably born with 'em. What kinda medical things could I do with ice?
I'm definitely curious what your singin' voice sounds like, but I bet you're not gonna start singin' for us right now, eh?
I don't think rock is somethin' ya can explain. It's somethin' that ya gotta hear.
Yeah, I'm actually here to promote my band, Melting Dreamscape! We don't got CDs yet, though, so you can only get our songs online right now.
Yep! I can freeze stuff and make ice outta nowhere! I've also been practicin' this technique where I make warm ice!
Oh, y'know, it's kinda old and a little rusty, and we don't got enough beds for everyone, so our bassist sleeps in a sleepin' bag.
Gah ha ha! Nah, I'm fine! I just try to do death growls, like death metal singers do!
Well, I mean... kinda? Bein' dead ain't cool, but the undead are fine by me, as long as they're friendly.
Y-yeah, exactly. Ice is neat, but it doesn't make me bullet-proof!
Gah ha ha! Guilty as charged! I wouldn't say I'm "reckless," but I don't think about all the little things that could go wrong with somethin'!
Both! I play guitar, keyboard, drums, and sing for our band!
I don't mind. Ya don't need that "san," though, no need for honorifics!
It's pretty great! America's nice, and I get to visit Japan a lot too! Only part that sucks is the jetlag!
Nope! At least, I think it ain't magic. If it were magic, I could do more than ice.
Wuzzat, Fluttershy? Ya said you're in a band too? Ya need to speak up a little. So what kinda music do ya play?
I can't say I've ever heard of this Roxie, but I assume she's pretty cool. What kinda music does she play?
Nope. Nuh uh. I dunno what gave ya that idea, I ain't a musician. Pfffft! Sorry, couldn't resist. Yep, I'm a rocker!
I was watchin' a DragonForce music video and realized that what I wanted to do more than anything was to shred like they do!
Really? Is it cuz I got somethin' stuck in my teeth? I knew I should'a brushed before comin' here...
Hmm... Nope, can't say I have. They do country music or somethin'?
Uh... Somethin' like five years or so. I forget exactly when I started playin'.
Well, I guess the technical classification is "alternative metal," but I'd describe us as "hard and loud." Rippin' riffs, hard drums, and we even got a beer keg for that Unsainted sound!
That was a marketin' idea I had! It was televised, so it was basically free publicity! Plus we could'a used the prize money to pay for our tour!
No no no, we play different obnoxious loud noises! Gah ha ha! We mostly just play what we feel like, which usually falls somewhere in the "alternative metal" range!

My name's Ibuki, but I'm supposed to be goin' by my stage name cuz I'm here to promote my band! If I look like your friend, we probably make the same music. Ya don't dress like this to play country, y'know?
Mostly just places that can't afford someone more famous! Ga ha! I don't mind, though, ya gotta start somewhere!

So there's our bassist, Charlotte. She's kinda like our leader, does all the "official" stuff. Then there's Kara, our drummer, and Emily, our keyboardist / beer-kegist. We've been playin' together for a few years now.
Nothin'! It's just a stage name! I needed one for wrestlin' and thought that sounded cool! I got it from a Slipknot song.

Gah ha! No one in this world has relied on a gramophone for, like, a century! Nowadays we just use our phones or computers to play digital files!... Oh, I guess ya wouldn't get any of that, eh? I'll explain later!
Well, it's the only one I got, but I don't think it's actually magic. It's more like a special tallent or somethin', not anything magical.
Mostly just novice boxin' skill and creative use of my ice powers. If ya got another prize fight comin' up, I might just try to bump those "novice" skills up to "journeyman."
Wha- No no, you misunderstand, Jessie. I ain't that kinda rocker! It's all about the music for me, no drugs or anything! I don't even eat fast food!
Yeah, but I want real wings! No one cares about a guy with a jetpack -- anyone can put one'a those on!
I do! Why? Ya like it?
Nice to meet ya too, Heris. I quite like your sweater.
"Punk rock?" I mean, yeah, I like to dress punk, but we don't actually play a lotta "punk rock" music. We lean more towards alternative metal... which is still pretty punk, in a way...
Lyre, eh? Not lute? They don't got chordophones where ya come from? But nah, that wasn't either of those, it was a guitar!
Don't worry, my band ain't like that. No drugs, no hotel room-trashin', no hardcore parties. When we finish a show, we drink green tea and play video games.
Yep! Made it all the way to the semi-finals, too!
I, uh... I don't actually have any flyers or anything. That would'a been a good idea... Not sure if we got the budget for flyers right now, though...
Oh dang, you've actually heard of me, ~other~? That's awesome! Thanks for listenin'!
Stage manager...? No, I designed it myself, but I did have a little help from my aunt Sonia.
Nah, that was a They Might Be Giants song. They got a lotta weird and silly songs, like "Put Your Hand Inside The Puppet Head" and "My Name Is Kingof Socks,"
Nope! I've had my powers since before becomin' a musician! I don't gotta strum or sing or anything to make ice, I just think it and it happens!
Of course I won't need any help! That's what my bandmates are for! Also I ain't here to play, I'm here to promote!
Of course I got a real name! It's "Ibuki!" I wasn't born Critical Darling, I had to become Critical Darling!
We got some pop-punk stuff, yeah, and sometimes when we do open rehearsals we cover the Mob Psycho 100 openings -- we all have a blast playin' 99.9!
Keh heh heh. Maybe if I were a normal chick I'd take off my socks...
Gah ha! Was only a matter of time 'til ya got me down to my birthday suit!
Okay, so normally this is where I'd tap out, but since we're at the beach, lemme take off everything. That way, we can go swimmin' when we're done, and I won't have to worry about losin' an earring!
No big! It's what I get for not really tryin' to win!
This is what I get for spendin' all my time on guitar practice instead of poker practice!
♪You stabbed me in the back, I couldn't believe it! I'm bleedin' out! Who can save me now?♪
♪Why was it easy for you? Did I deserve the abuse? I can't believe I let it!♪
♪You can do your worst to me! At the end of the day, that's what you do best!♪
♪Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy? Caught in a landslide, no escape from reality!♪
♪Fuck! Fuck! Fuuuuuuuuck...♪ But for real, this ain't good, no matter what my plan was...
♪I'm never enough, you bleed me dry! Usin' me up! Dissatisfied! And used! Another key to the empty spot in you!♪
♪She's like heroin, sipping through a little glass! I'm looking for some help, I need someone to save my ass!♪
♪Kao de waratte kokoro de naite, 'Soo yo ne'tte namida wa mise-nai no~!♪
♪Trust in my self-righteous suicide!♪
♪Tru~st i~n my~ self-righteous suici~de!♪
♪TRUUUUST IIIIIIN MYYYY SELF-RIGHTEOUS SUICIIIIIDE! IIIIII CRYYYY WHEN ANGELS DESERVE TO DIIIIIE!♪ Oops, sorry, got carried away there...
Okay, this ain't funny anymore...
Okay, seriously, what the fuck? This can't just be bad luck!
I ain't tryin' hard but I am still tryin'! I shouldn't be losin' so hard...
Why do I get the feelin' that even if I started tryin' not to lose, I'd still be losin' anyway?
I won't let ya go through this alone, ~player~!
I got your back, ~player~. You lose some, I lose some.
Can't let my ~player~ do all the strippin' between us two.
My ~player~ has done enough strippin' for now. It's time for me to lose some too.
Wouldn't be much of a match if I let my ~player~ get too far ahead of me!
We're in this together, ~player~!
Can't let ya have all the fun, ~player~!... I mean, between the two of us...
You're not tryin' to have fun without me, are ya, ~player~?
Wait, crap, I'm outta stuff... But I need to last one more round, for... reasons...
Crap, I'm outta stuff... but I feel this bizarre compulsion to last one more round...
Wait wait wait, hang on. Hear me out: Why don't I take off my earrings and ribbons too? I've never gotten fully nude at one'a these, so how about I do that now?
Ah! I guess I didn't have high card, I had low card! Gah ha ha!
Aw. Losin' with this junk would'a been fine, but losin' with junk when someone else has junk too? Lame!
I'll get this poker game off to a rockin' start!
♪Go ahead and try to see through me, do it if you dare! One step forward, two steps back, I'll be there!♪
About freakin' time! I ain't even tryin' over here!
Pffft! Y'all need to up your game if you're lettin' me go this long without strippin' again!
Seriously, how'd ya let me go this long without strippin'? I ain't even tryin'!
And here I was thinkin' you were never gonna get to me!
So my panties are next, but, uh... don't get your hopes up too high, 'kay...?
♪I am all, but what am I? Another number that isn't equal to any of you! I control but I comply, pick me apart then pick up the pieces!♪
♪It's always somebody else, somebody else was me!♪
♪It wasn't somebody else, you fuckin' did it to me!♪
I guess I got what I wanted! ♪Another needle in the back through purified scarification!♪
♪Are you ready, hey, are you ready for this? Are you hangin' on the edge of your seat? Out of the door where the bullets rip, to the sound of the beat!♪
♪Is this what you want? I'm not the only one!♪
I'm just a poor girl, I need no sympathy, ♪because I'm easy come, easy go, little high, little low!♪
♪Here we go again, motherfucker!♪
I can't even be mad when the amount of times I've lost is still less than the amount of Slipknot members!
I'm barely tryin' here, so I'd hope I'd lose at least once!
♪I studied silence to learn the music! I joined the sinful to regain innocence!♪
Nah. Most of my bad ideas don't get past the idea phase, and the ones that do don't go all that badly.
I probably should design my own shirt so Flaming Joy doesn't sue me or whatevs!
Eh, that's cool and all, but I don't really wanna be a hero. I'd probably just end up gettin' myself killed anyway.
It ain't about the fame, it's about the music! I play for all crowds, big and small -- I'll even play for an empty room, I don't care! If you ain't gonna be in my crowd, fine, see ya, buh bye.

Oh, sorry. I just assumed they'd be "space rockers" cuz I thought they'd tour space, maybe have some alien bandmates -- alien to both of us, I know that word's relative. They don't got bands like that?
Neat! I didn't realize just how versatile ice is!
That's fair. I get not everyone likes singin' in front of others. Some people are songbirds, and some are... what's the opposite of a songbird? A... mutefish...?
Relatively new, yeah. We've only been playin' together for a couple of years.
Well, ya could eat the ice, cuz it's just ice, but why would ya? It's ice! And the warm ice is done through latent heat or something, I don't really know.
Eh, it's comfortable enough, I guess. We've definitely stayed at places with nicer beds, though.
Uh, yeah? That's my birth name. Why? What's up?
I mean, I get the desire to be a hero and stuff, but like, why's it gotta be me? People without powers are heroes, so why can't I have powers and not be one?
Huh. Connections... Yeah, that's a good idea too. I was more thinkin' I could get people here to really remember me, build some fame and junk.
Probably, yeah, but also no. Ideally it'd have the same feel, but not the same sound, y'know what I mean?
Like, electric powers? That'd be kinda rad, but nah, I only got ice powers, and I don't think I can get more.
No no no! There's no actual dyin' in death metal! Well, unless your Dethklok, I guess, but that ain't my goal.
Would it really be such a bad thing if someone came back to life somehow? A lotta people wanna see their dead loved ones again.
Nice to met ya too, Spider-Woman!... Huh, that's a lot more simple a name than I'm used to. It's like ya got first dibs on it or somethin'!
Nice to meet ya too, Gwen! I never thought of super hero names as also bein' stage names. I guess I'd still be "Critical Darling" if I became one too!
I was born with 'em, I think. I've never been in any freak accidents or anything. They kinda just... appeared one day.
Successful and talented! "Shreddin'" isn't literal, it's when a guitarist plays really fast, and it sounds really awesome!

Nah, not really. The song's about religion or somethin', I'm not really sure. I actually like other songs on that album more, but "Nero Forte" was already taken, and "Unsainted" wouldn't be a cool nickname.
Oh yeah, we totally do. None of us got any other friends, so we hung out a lot even before we started our tour.
Well alright. I ain't gonna stop ya if ya insist on it.
I dunno. It's hard to say, cuz it's been my whole life, y'know? It just feels normal to me.
I dunno. They kinda just... appeared one day. I guess I coulda eaten some kinda cursed fruit or somethin', if one'a those ended up at the supermarket somehow...
Here's hoping! In the mean time, I should definitely come up with some flyer designs...
No no, I got my own songs! Plenty of 'em! I just find it more fun to reference other people's stuff. Referencing my own stuff just feel pretentious, y'know?
Eh? Songwriter, ya say? That's great! I bet ya put a lotta heart in your songs!
Sounds about right. That's pretty much what ya do when ya make music: Ya make songs about stuff you're passionate about. Wether it's politics, fantasy tales, or hot-dogs!
Yeah, but we've used similar things for most of that time too. Like just a couple decades ago we were usin' CDs, which are kinda like small records.
Huh... I guess I can't really be sure, but magic is somethin' ya gotta learn, right? My ice showed up outta nowhere.

Sure! You'll have to talk to Charlotte later -- she's the one who does all that official stuff. You sure ya want an alternative band playin' at your club, though? I'd expect a place run by a lady such as yourself to be too fancy for that!
It ain't just about flyin', it's about lookin' cool doin' it! That's why they gotta be real, cuz it just looks way cooler!
Oh, nothin' special. Just shampoo and conditioner. I don't exactly got the budget for fancy stuff.

It depends on who wrote the song -- everyone in the band gets to write lyrics. Sometimes we sing about personal stuff like bad relationships and loss, and sometimes we just sing about fightin' evil and slayin' dragons.
Ah, it's okay. It's somethin' ya gotta hear for yourself, not just have someone describe to ya. That's kinda like tryin' to taste somethin' by lookin' at it.
Yeah, I lost in the semi-finals, so I didn't get the grand prize... But I did get some prize money for third, so it's not all bad.
Well, it would be cool to start bein' known as the literally kick-ass rocker, and I'm willin' to take a beatin' for my band, so I'll take a chance on another tournament!
Gah ha! Nah, alternative metal is, like, metal with sounds from other genres. We kinda just play what we feel like, but it always comes out metal, y'know?
Yeah, kinda. It's easy to learn the basics, but there's a lotta extra stuff to learn to add some extra flair to your songs.
Well, it's a bit more complicated than that. Let's just say that we got reasons other than preference to stay away from that kinda stuff -- especially drugs.
Hey! Mismatchin' is on purpose!... At least, it is now...
I guess I wouldn't know. You know ~player~ better than I do.
Ska... That's, like, Smash Mouth, right...? Can't say we got anything like that...
But I ain't a normal chick, I'm a rocker chick, and rocker chicks know how to give the crowd what they want!

... Wait, am I sure I wanna show so many people my tits...? Eh, fuck it, they're just tits.
Oh, right, gotta remember to say the brand's name. My outfit was made by Brainfreeze! This is their logo right here, on this little collar dealy.
Oh, almost forgot, the brand who made this outfit is called Brainfreeze. This is their logo here, on the collar dealy.
This whole schoolgirl look was Emily's idea. She thinks seifuku are super cute. I'm not super big on 'em myself, but whatevs.
This whole schoolgirl look was Emily's idea. She thinks seifuku are super cute. I gotta admit, they are pretty fitting outfits for when we perform the songs she wrote.

For once, my socks aren't just mismatched cuz I lost the other one, Brainfreeze actually sells 'em like this!
Okay, I gotta be honest, as much as I love skirts, there really isn't anything that makes this Brainfreeze skirt better than other skirts. A skirt's a skirt, y'know?
I could'a got these punk sandals that look like my bracelets for this outfit, but I just don't like sandals. I'd rather risk gettin' sand in my shoes.
I could'a got some sandals to go with this outfit, but I prefer sneakers. Sandals just hurt my feet...
I'll just go for some of my accessories -- but not the pins on my skirt. They work too well.

I'll just go for some of my accessories -- I'm not even the kind of cool that can get away with sunglasses indoors, anyway.

Not to brag, but I kinda love that I can wear dresses like this no matter the weather. Who would'a though bein' immune to cold would be so fashionable?

... Well, okay, I say that, but I'm still gonna make ya work for it a bit.

I thought about wearin' boots with this outfit, but I like how light on my feet I feel in sneakers.
Unlike Rachel at the Tragic Muse, ♪I didn't forget to wear comfortable shoes!♪ Seriously, sneakers are the best!
I couldn't figure out if boots were more punk than sneakers, so I went with the most punk option of all: whatever I felt like!

I know I could be wearin' snowboots and stuff to go with my ice powers, but I don't wanna be tied into one look just cuz I happen to have a super power. It's like, what, should I wear kimono too cuz I'm Japanese?
I have, like, eight of these shirts, so I didn't feel bad about punkifying this one.
Do ya like this shirt? I sure do! I got, like, eight of 'em!
This was a pretty normal T-shirt when I bought it. I made the sleeve and bottom alterations myself!
This is a T-shirt for one'a my favorite bands: Flaming Joy. My uncle Kaz used to be a roadie for 'em!
This is a T-shirt for one'a my favorite bands: Flaming Joy. Sure hope they don't, like, sue me or somethin' for havin' this as part of my signature look...
Sometimes the middle of the song is the best part! Like how ya don't get to the solos in Through The Fire And Flames 'til half way through!

Topless-skirt is such a good look, shame my skirt's gotta go. I mean, it's doesn't have to, but, uh... seems like the right thing to take off right now.
Ya think my love of skirts and my ice powers are connected? Cuz y'know, it's like... Nah, never mind, that was a dumb thought...

Ain't much changin' for me here. For you, I'm showin' my panties, but for me, I'm exposin' a small amount of skin.

This is where my lack of knowledge of panty-droppin' music comes back to bite me...
Y'know, I know songs about droppin' bodies and songs about droppin' plates, but not any songs about droppin' panties...
None of the bands I listen to have songs about droppin' panties. Guess they're too busy bein' angry about politics and junk to be horny...
I don't actually know any panty-droppin' songs. Guess I gotta write my own, probably make it somethin' about a dragon-slayer who gets a lotta action... That could work...

I hope my chest is good enough for ya, ~player~.
Stare all ya like, ~player~, I don't mind!
Right! So if I haven't rocked your socks off just yet, don't worry, I will soon!

So there aren't, like, real life elves or sexy fish people out there in space? That bites...

Oh, yeah, I guess ya could do that, but then you'd need the non-ice ingredients too!
Of course I do, but that's what phones and stuff are for, right? Plus we always return home for special occasions.
Hey, don't get me wrong, I'll still try to ice ya if ya go too far outta line!
We call it "cryo" here too sometimes, if ya wanna sound fancy or need an ice prefix!
Don't worry if ya don't get it. You'll get it once ya hear some rock for yourself.
Dethklok ain't a clock, they're a band, and they definitely don't got that power! They're just normal dudes.
Well I think there's nothin' wrong with bein' undead as long as ya don't cause trouble. If someone's got the willpower or whatever to come back, more power to 'em!
Yeah, sure! I just gotta get my guitar outta the RV first.
Sure, but you're gonna have to be ready for them to sound nothin' like what you're probably used to!
Oh definitely! Nothin's better than hangin' out with people who just get ya!
Piercin'? Yowch! No thanks! That makes me glad ya don't gotta do what everyone else is doin' to be punk!
That's the thing, though, I didn't eat anything weird! At least, not that I saw. I guess it could'a been in a smoothie or somethin'...
Nah, I can't draw that good, but I should be able to get my ideas across and hand 'em over to someone who can draw!
Nah, I gotta pass on that. Goin' out of the country for someone else's concern ain't exactly in my tourin' schedule.
Nah, I can believe it. Songs with heart are what ya sing to get rid of evil sirens, I hear. Or was it that ya sing their songs backwards...?
Oh, keh heh! Nah! It stands for "compact disk." My initials being "CD" are just a coincidence. Besides, I'm too young to have had CDs named after me!
I guess you're right. I got nothin' to lose by tryin'!
Nah, bat wings would be cliché. I wanna get phoenix wings, burnin' with blue flames!
Okay, sure! It'll be fun to have normal hair for once! Gah ha!
Rad! Then once we get the official stuff sorted out, we are so there!
Heck yeah, I'll play for ya sometime! How often do ya get the opportunity to play guitar for someone who's never heard of guitar before!
Yeah. Some people like lookin' like they couldn't find their other sock... and some people actually can't find their other sock...
Hey! Remember what I just said? I wasn't born Critical Darling! Rock gods aren't born, they're forged, ya feel me?
Of course, I don't always do this, it's just a special occasion. You're welcome.

Seriously, how many times am I gonna keep forgettin' to get some nail polish before I finally remember? Dang it...
Man, I feel so light on my feet now! I didn't think my boots were all that heavy.

Enjoy the floofage.
