I think I might actually have the biggest bust here! That's a first!
My breasts may be the smallest here, but that just makes 'em special!
... Boobs don't get any bigger once ya pass 18, right? Unless ya get pregnant, I guess, but I don't got any plans for that anytime soon!
Geez. I didn't expect to be the only one here who didn't shave...
Didn't expect to be the only one here who didn't shave... B-but at least I don't got a hairy butt, right? Gah ha!...
Gentlemen, behold! Boobs!
At least I don't gotta worry about bein' the smallest chest here when I'm the only chick!
So yeah, expect a few more rounds of that. Sorry!
Oh hey, I'm the first one naked... Uh, you're welcome, I guess!
Oh hey, I'm the first one naked... Uh, you're welcome, I guess!... And here's my butt, for an added bonus!
Sorry about bein' late to the nude party!
Sorry about bein' late to the nude party! Hope my butt makes up for it!
Stare all ya like! I don't mind!
Stare all ya like! I might be convinced to let ya touch 'em, too...
So uh... yeah. There ya go! A naked rocker for your self-pleasing, uh... pleasure.
Uh... Th-the view from the back is better than the view from the front, don'tcha think?...
Don't worry, my legs won't start gettin' cold now. I stopped ever feelin' too cold after I discovered my ice powers.
And with that, my look is ruined! I kinda banked hard on the gloves!
And with that, my look is ruined! Without the gloves, this outfit is too casual!
Whatevs. That finger-havin' glove was just weighing me down anyway -- I mean, it wasn't weighted, cuz that's a dumb idea, but ya know what I mean.
Fetish or not, I wouldn't wanna play with my boobs with gloves on anyway... I... probably shouldn't have said that...
I don't need gloves to handle my ice anyway. My hands don't get cold -- I don't get cold at all!
By the way, probably a bad time to ask, but do ya like my outfit? I tried to go for somethin' between Judy Nails and Su-Metal a la Doki Doki Morning's music video.
Ever hear of a guy named Kingof Socks? Well I'm his sister, Queenof Socks, ♪and nothing can stop me from showing off my socks!♪
I wear shoes most of the day anyway, so this is just a nice change of pace!
Ya got my shoes, but ya ain't gettin' my socks. They're too stylish to give up so quick!
I would'a ripped it off to be all cool and stuff, but I don't got the budget for a new one... And I can't exactly run home to grab another when I'm so far from it!
Stylin' the shirt like that was my aunt Sonia's idea. I dunno if I ever would'a thought to do that myself. Probably eventually...

And yeah, I realize wearin' a shirt with a flamin' skull is ironic when I got ice powers, but I don't care. I shouldn't have to have ice iconography all over my clothes just cuz I happen to have ice powers.
Y'know, if I were a super hero, I would'a been shoehorned into ice iconography for my outfit, so I wouldn't have been able to wear that shirt. That ain't punk at all.
I'm glad I'm not a super hero, cuz then I'd get a bunch of people tellin' me I can't wear things with flames on 'em. Just cuz I can shoot ice doesn't mean I gotta wear ice.
Would ya believe me if I said I forgot to pack bras when I started my tour? Well I didn't! Buuut I didn't have any clean ones today...
And just like Through The Fire And Flames, this won't stop bein' good once we pass the middle!
I got the second smallest boobs in my band. Sorry!
Don'tcha know? A band's success ain't just based on how good they can play. It's also about how good of a show they can put on while they play! So obviously I'd apply that principle here too!
If you like my boobs, you're gonna love my music!... I know those aren't related, shut up...
Sorry, my super power ain't havin' big boobs...
'Course, I always have a buffer between my skirt and panties! It's basically mandatory if ya wanna stage-dive.
I wonder just how many rocker chicks out there have stage-dived without anything on under their skirts...? Can't say I'm one of 'em!
Maybe next time I'll save the skirt for last. That's be pretty hot...
Maybe next time I'll save the skirt for last. Do the whole "topless suspenders" look too, be a real big tease.
Skirts are hot, but I'm hotter, so it'll be worth ditchin' it once ya make me lose a few more times.
Gah ha! Now it's like I'm a dude in swim trunks! I ain't about to go to the beach like this, though!
I got these legs from luggin' gear. It's why ya don't lift with your back.
One time, I fell out of a tree and got a big slash on my thigh. Had to get stitches, but it fully healed eventually! There ain't even a scar!
I feel like I'm cheatin'! Not much changed now, and when I lose again, all you'll get is panties!
I wear these panties all the time, by the way. Even when ya don't plan on someone seein' 'em, ya still gotta like how your underwear looks!
I'm actually pretty bummed I couldn't find a purple flame bra to match with these panties. Best I got is this purple and black striped bra.
If anything's embarrassin' about this for me, it's that ya now know I have eccentric taste in underwear, but c'mon, ya already knew!
If you're actually surprised I have purple flame underwear, you haven't been payin' attention!
Hope ya weren't expectin' strawberry underwear or somethin'! That ain't my style!
Yeah yeah, I know, it's ironic to wear flame panties when I have ice powers. You know what they say: "Dress for the powers ya want, not the powers ya got."
There! Now y'all have seen a naked rock star! Be sure to tell your friends!
I ain't afraid of bein' naked in front of y'all! Dont'cha know the way you overcome stage fright is to imagine yourself naked? So I've already practiced for this like a dozen times in my head!
Ain't like I haven't been to a bathhouse before! Besides, gettin' naked was part of my plan!
I got the second smallest boobs in the band, but I got the best butt, right?
How often do ya ever get to see a punk rocker's bare butt? Never, I bet!
A lesser punk would say "Kiss my ass" right now, but I'm so punk that I'm not gonna conform with what other punks would do! I'll let ya look, but ya don't gotta kiss it!
Hey, what do ya think of my butt? Worth droppin' plates on? ♪Plates on my ass, bitch, plates on my ass!♪ Gah ha ha!
Don't worry about my choker and junk. Beat me again and I'm goin' down for the count. You're welcome.
Gotta admit, for a chick with ice powers, I'm still pretty hot, right?
Gotta admit, for a chick with ice powers, my butt's pretty hot, right?
Don't worry about me feelin' too cold like this. I don't get cold -- even in winter! Pretty sure that's part of my ice abilities.

state.text: Don't worry about me feelin' too cold like this. I don't get cold -- even in winter! Pretty sure that's part of my ice abilities. You know what ain't a part of my abilities, though? My nice butt.

case.state: Don't sweat this loss, ~name~. Happens to the best of us!
I'm sure whatever you're gonna take off will be great, ~name~.
Wait, are ya tryin' to win, or more of the "would rather lose" type? Well, either way, I support ya!
Let's see how rockin' my ~player~ is!
Ya lose so gracefully, ~player~!
Is it okay to watch my ~player~ take stuff off? Am I supposed to ask for permission or somethin'?
Gah ha ha! Take that, ~player~!
Serves ya right for bein' a perv, ~player~.
I'm totally gonna beat ya, ~player~!
What are ya waitin' for, ~player~? Take somethin' off!
You're not scared to take somethin' off in front of me, are ya, ~player~?
♪Thought you were hot, guess what, you're not!♪ Gah ha ha! I bet ya don't even know that one, ~player~!
So ya gonna take somethin' off or are ya gonna be a sore loser, ~player~?
♪You lose!♪ I might even make that a full song, just for you, ~player~!
♪Hey Mr. Jack, is that the mouthwash in your eyes? Hey Mr. Jack, is that the cause of your surprise?♪
Not gonna tell us your name, eh? That's fine. "Mister" will do... but "Mister Jack" will do better!
Nearly bonked your conk, eh? Don't wanna bonk your conk cuz then you'll feel wonk and fall on your badonkadonk! Gah ha ha!
I like your look, dude. Very disco. Not my jam, but ya make it work!
Hey, what's with all those keys ya got there? Are ya a janitor or somethin'?
H-hey, you a wrestler too? Pfffft. I-I'm sure -- eheh -- I'm sure ya do great. Pfffft! Sorry, sorry! I'm tryin' to take ya seriously, it's just... Bah hahaha haha!
You a wrestler too, cat boy? Heh heh. You, uh, should probably beef up your costume. I mean ya can be whatever ya want in the ring, but even I'm havin' a hard time takin' you seriously!
Hey, uh... you sure about the whole "cat boy" look? I mean far be it from me to steer someone away from somethin' they like, but I think you'd be much better off as like a lion or somethin'.

Your costume's kinda plain, but ya got my support, cat boy! Don't let anyone stop ya from bein' cat boy! Ya gotta sing what's in your heart, y'know? Even if your costume makes it hard to take ya seriously!
So this is what it'd be like if Toyslinger was a card game guy instead of a toy gun guy! I guess that makes ya "Cardslinger!"
You Toyslinger's brother or somethin'? Wait wait, lemme guess, you're "Cardslinger!" Am I right?
You mean to tell me you can't fly with those wings? What kinda sick joke is that? Givin' a guy wings and not lettin' him fly?
♪Dog dog dog dog dog dog dog!♪ Gah ha!... Oh, right, I guess I gotta explain that...
Hey, if you're ♪Dog dog dog dog dog dog dog♪ then I guess I'm ♪Sleep expensive cloud enjoy!♪ Gah ha!... Oh, I guess I gotta explain that one...
Nice punk school boy look, dude! I don't see many guys doin' a good punk look, let alone punk school boy!
Wait, you say you're a "supreme leader?" You sure you ain't a chef, cuz you really look like one!
Nice arm dealy, guy! Is that some kinda synth or somethin'? I'll stick to keytars, thanks!
You ain't the first cowboy I've gone against. Hope ya got somethin' stronger than plunger guns in your arsenal!
So, uh... Are those... live rockets...?
You're Japanese too, eh? Nihongo wa hanasemasu ka?
Hey wait, aren't ya supposed to be protectin' a city or somethin'? Ya sure ya got time for a game like this?
"Ignatz," eh? I'm just gonna call ya "Iggy," if that's okay.
So ya paint, eh? I respect painters. I'm pretty terrible at any art that ain't music.
What's it like, bein' a researcher? How do ya know what to look into? Or when you're done?
So do ya get any powers with that cat suit? Magically appearin' ain't the only thing it can do for ya?
You can control your mind-readin', right? I bet it'd drive ya crazy if you were always hearin' everyone's thoughts.
Hey, don'tcha think it's interesting how photography is like the one art where you're capturin' somethin' beautiful rather than makin' it from scratch?
Don't worry, I ain't gonna make fun of ya for bein' deep into Uno. You do you.
Hey, I've always wondered, can angels die? Cuz you already come from heaven, so where would you go if you did die?
I dunno if you'd have the answer for this, but... Metal music isn't actually satanic, right...? I'm not gonna go to hell for playin' it...?
So ya like to cook, right? What's your favorite thing to make?
Ya got any healthy meal recommendations for someone who's on tour? We already try to eat pretty healthily, but we could try some new stuff too.
Ya shouldn't be seein' this line. It's probably playin' cuz I ran outta things to say!
Don't sweat this loss, ~name~. Happens to the best of us!
I'm sure whatever you're gonna take off will be great, ~name~.
Wait, are ya tryin' to win, or more of the "would rather lose" type? Well, either way, I support ya!
Let's see how rockin' my ~player~ is!
Ya lose so gracefully, ~player~!
Is it okay to watch my ~player~ take stuff off? Am I supposed to ask for permission or somethin'?
Gah ha ha! Take that, ~player~!
Serves ya right for bein' a perv, ~player~.
I'm totally gonna beat ya, ~player~!
What are ya waitin' for, ~player~? Take somethin' off!
You're not scared to take somethin' off in front of me, are ya, ~player~?
♪Thought you were hot, guess what, you're not!♪ Gah ha ha! I bet ya don't even know that one, ~player~!
So ya gonna take somethin' off or are ya gonna be a sore loser, ~player~?
♪You lose!♪ I might even make that a full song, just for you, ~player~!
♪Hey, Miss Murder can I -- Hey, Miss Murder can I, make beauty stay if I, take my life! Whoa-oh-oh!♪
Not gonna tell us your name, eh? That's fine. "Miss" will do... but "Miss Murder" will do better!
Heck yeah! Lets see ya blow the doors off this place!
I can think of several things ya could probably be based on your clothes, so I'll just ask ya: what are ya?
So you must know a bunch of sea shanties, eh? Got any favorites?
So since your bandmate is a zombie, you must be one too, right? Ooh, or maybe you're a different kinda classic monster!
Wait, what about high-rise apartments and house boats and stuff like that?
Oh, a sheet? Where's this goin'?
Alright, sure! Let's hear what you're all about!
Y'know, when ya think about it, photography ain't really about creatin' somethin' beautiful, but capturin' it, which makes it unlike most other arts.
You a wrestler too, Ladybug? You happen to be friends with La Escarabajo? Her stuff is pretty rad. I hope you got rad stuff too!
You must be one'a La Escarabajo's friends, huh, Ladybug? But if that's true, where's all your tech stuff?

You a big fan of La Escarabajo, huh, Ladybug? I never fought her in the ring, but I met her once! I asked her to pinch me with that mecha-claw of hers and it hurt like mad! You got anything like that?
You must be a big fan of Rib Tickler, huh? I think she's pretty great too. I respect how she can beat dudes up while also bein' a funny clown!
Ugh, I dunno if I can look at clowns the same after seein' Contre Auguste. Freakin' evil clowns ruinin' nice clowns for everyone...
Wait wait, don't tell me. You must be "Art Gallery, the porcelain chick who hits like a brick!" Am I right?
Ha! It's funny, I almost went with rainbow hair when I came up with my rocker look! But black is much more punk, and plus I don't gotta dye my hair!
Man, I thought my hair was floofy! We're, like, floof rivals or somethin'!
Sick body mods, dude! Not sure that needle is NHBF-legal, though, so I hope you're not plannin' to enter the next open tournament!
Aw crap, your giant needle reminds me I haven't been to a doctor in ages...
Hey, you're a doctor, right? Since you're probably gonna see me naked anyway, can ya give me a quick check-up? I haven't gotten one in a while...
Huh. Robot wings. Why'd that never cross my mind before...? But do I really want robot wings? That seems like cheatin'...
Dang holograms, takin' gigs away from livin' rockers...
Well, at least there's one rocker here who ain't a hologram! Me! Critical Darling!
I respect the singers whose voices go into these things, but I just don't dig these hologram performers. They just take jobs away from real performers!
Oh, you're an explosion mage, eh? Think you can take me and my ice powers?... If you spend any time honin' your skills, you'll probably beat me. I spend all my time on my musical skills...
Wait wait, don't tell me. You're... La Espidera! Okay, I don't know Spanish... But you're totally a wrestler too, right?
Nice hair! I thought about doin' purple streaks in my hair, but hair dye ain't exactly in my budget!
Dang! An actual goddess!... Hey, do ya think ya can give me wings...?
Yo, a literal goddess!... Hey, I know you're not, like, a genie, but do ya think ya can give me wings? I'll trade my ice powers for 'em!
Hey, aren't you that serial killer? Well, good thing I'm a cute girl and not a cute boy!... Oh, and don't try anything funny or I'll ice ya, 'kay?
Hey, aren't you that serial killer? Was there a bounty on your head? Cuz if there is I'm just gonna ditch this game and bring you in! I need the money more than I need the exposure.
I'm cool with a talkin' butterfly, but how's a butterfly gonna strip? Put that in your thinkin' machine!
Oh man! Imagine how much I could shred with four arms! I'd rather have wings, but four arms would be rad!
Oh man! If I had four arms, I'd get one'a those guitars with two necks! I bet I'd drawn in a big crowd playin' both necks at once!
Do you get your elf powers from fries or somethin'? Or do elves just really love potatoes?
Hey, you look like my bandmate, Emily! 'Cept her hair isn't pink, and she ditched the school girl look when we formed Melting Dreamscape!
Okay, there's no way you're not a wrestler, Ms. Oni. Does that mask give you powers? That'd be pretty sweet!

You remind me of this one guy I fought, Muerte Obscura. He was this grim reaper-lookin' guy who could summon the undead. He was no match for me and my ice! Also his costume wrecked his peripheral vision.

Your name reminds me of this one guy I heard about, Raven von Grimblade. Apparently he's this guy who served as the blade of a tyrannical monarchy, but he gave that up and became a hero. Pretty rad of him!
♪Dressed as one, a wolf will betray a lamb! Lead astray the gazers, the razors on your seducing skin!♪
Ya don't need arms to rock! You could play a... no. You could...! Nnn... I'm sure there's some way you could rock!
Ya don't need arms to rock! I'm sure if the drummer from Def Leppard could drum with one arm, you can do it with no arms! Ya just gotta... use your feet or somethin'!
Ya don't need arms to rock! If those guys can go around bein' one-man bands, I'm sure you could be a one-gal part-of-a-band! Ya just need one'a those harmonica holder thingies!
Huh, well, I guess you bein' a hologram YouTuber is fine. There ain't exactly a "gig" to be had there.
Your robot wings are kinda cool, but I gotta get real wings. You're a doctor, right? Can ya give me real wings somehow?
You might be the "Ultimate Gamer," but I bet anything I could kick your butt at Guitar Hero! Or really any rhythm game!... Except DDR, I can't dance...
Why didn't I expect to see a porn star here...? It's like so obvious now...
So you're Streaming-chan, eh? Nihongo wa hanasemasu ka?
Wait wait, I think I know you... You're... Jamie, right? That dragon chick?
Hey, I know you! You're that chick with the shotgun gauntlets, right? Those are super rad!
You some kinda pop idol or somethin'? Ya got that look, but I don't keep up with idols, so I dunno.
You look like ya perform in some kinda gothic rock band, am I right? You part of a band?
So, uh... what was it you're famous for, again? I know you're famous, but I can't remember what for...
You remind me of this one chick I heard about, the Quickshot Queen... Oh, and also Clean Kill... And Warning Shot... And... Dang, there are a lotta gun-totin' dudes out there...
So you're a vampire rocker, eh? Ya get to... float around while ya rock... Must be nice...
Man, imagine if I had the ARMS Ability too. I could shred with my guitar on the other side of the stage! That'd be pretty dope!
Hey wait, I think I know you! You're from that one group... the, um... BiBi, right?
Hey! I've heard of ya before! You're that, uh... what was the prefered term...?
Tits ASAP, eh? I like how you think!
Y'know, I find it funny how prevalent monster battlin' is where ya come from. Like, ya catch a guy robbin' a store, and ya both just throw out your monsters.
A lawyer, eh? How good are your rates? I may need one'a you for copyrights and stuff.
So you come from a pretty traditional village, eh? That's cool, but I ain't one for tradition. I'm more of a city gal.
Hey, if ya think about it, court trials are like guitar duels. Doesn't matter who wins as long as the end result is good, right?
So you do beauty contest-type things, eh? What're those like?
I think it's pretty cool of ya to focus on contests instead of battles like everyone else. Gotta go with what's in your heart, not what everyone else is doin', am I right?

So you're, like, the world's greatest detective, eh? I feel like all detectives call themselves that... Well, except that one guy who didn't even really want to be one, but I'm not convinced that guy was real.
Titty time?... Oh, no, your gloves. Well, that's cool too.
So you're a robot, eh? You got any cool built-in tools or weapons or whatevs?
Gotta be honest, I think ya could use a different hairstyle. Your current one makes your head look like a tomato.
Oh geez, ya popped a button there!
So if ya don't grant wishes, what exactly does a genie do?
So you're a pretty traditional chick, eh? That's, uh... That's cool. I'm not really one for tradition, myself...
Obviously ya got those ears and tail, so what other weird, not-human things do ya got? Do ya got a real good sense of smell or anything?
I respect the gal behind your voice, but I just can't get down with this "digital diva" stuff. It's, like, the epitome of a lot of the problems with the music industry, especially in Japan.
So what is it that ya do, Fina? Ya look like a princess or somethin'.
So what are ya the goddess of, exactly?
So you got that "living encyclopedia" thing goin' on, eh? Is that some kinda super power, or did'ja just read a lotta books?

Hey, why do ya go by "Wikipe-tan?" Is it supposed to sound like "Wikipedia?" Cuz it doesn't really, and it forces ya to use an informal suffix. I would expect someone like you to be "Wiki-sensei" or somethin'.
So you're a pirate, eh? I look out at the sea a lot but I've never been on it. What's it like?
That's a pretty dope suit you're wearin' there. I could see someone doin' some techno rock in that!
You fight in that getup? I mean, it's a nice outfit, I could see someone rockin' in it, but fightin'? Aren't ya afraid a boob's gonna slip out or somethin'?
I gotta say, I respect dudes like you that don't got powers but choose to be heroes anyway. Proves powers aren't what make ya special!
You, uh... You don't exactly seem like the type to be here. Ya sure ya wanna play?
So what do ya like to do for fun, Nagisa?
Ya ever thought about settin' your poems to a melody? Ya don't even gotta sing it yourself, just supply 'em to someone else if ya want.
I just thought of someone else ya remind me of, Natsuki! I saw this chick on the news who also had pink hair, and she had these rad robot arms! Ya ever thought about gettin' robot arms?
Are you, uh... the Jason...? I never did do well with horror movies...
Hold up, did you say you're an angel? Where's your wings? Are they really that hard to get...?
When ya beat a guy, they explode into coins, right? What's that like? None of the guys I beat ever exploded into coins.
You're one'a those minion type dudes, eh? That's, uh, fine, I guess. I ain't here to stop ya. Hope it pays well.
So you're from hell, eh? You ever see the devil? Is he as good at fiddlin' as they say?
Oh dang, I didn't realize hell could have an overpopulation problem... Wait, shouldn't that be a good thing, bein' all cramped and crowded down there? It's supposed to suck.
What kinda music do they play in hell? The stereotype is metal, but that ain't torture to me, that'd actually be sweet!
Hey, uh, Angela, are ya so carin' cuz you've lost someone close to ya? Ya don't wanna lose more people? One'a my bandmates is the same way.
What do ya do, Leonie? Ya look like a soccer player to me -- or "football," if you're so inclined!
Y'know, ya kinda remind me of my bandmate, Kara. Ya happen to know how to drum too?
Yoooo, it's Girlfriend! I love Friday Night Funkin!
Right right left right up right left up up right up right down left down left down right right right left right up right down right up down left right? Ugh.
So what do ya like to do for fun on a normal day, aside from your band work?
You remind me of this chick from the wrestlin' tournament I was in, La Escarabajo! She had a green and yellow suit kinda like yours, and she had this big metal pincer and a mechanical pair of wings!
So what's life like in space? Do ya ever have to readjust to gravity cuz ya spent too much time where it's higher or lower?
Stage fright, eh? Ya know ya could'a just wore a mask, right?
So what's up with the knee pads? Ya spend a lotta time on your knees?... Er, not like that, I mean, uh... actually I can't think of any jobs that'd have ya on your knees a lot...
Did'ja say you're a mercenary? You one'a those Order of Heroes dudes or are ya freelance?
Yo, I've heard of you before! You can split your body apart, and use your blood to propel yourself! Your powers are so freakin' metal!
I've always wondered, is your outfit the way it is cuz you were cut up while wearin' it, or do ya wear that because you got cut up and can split apart?

Yo, you're one'a those chicks from that Touhou series, aren't ya? Those games are super big in Japan! I never got into 'em myself, though. I'm super bad at top-down shooters. And first-person shooters... and third-person shooters...
Your name's "Stocking," eh? Stocking like the legwear or stocking like ya stock shelves?
They make any cool weapons where you come from? Like arm cannons or BFGs?
So if you're not that Jason, why do ya got that mask and machete?
I've always wondered, what do Lifenoodles taste like? They must be pretty good, right?
Hey, ya ever play a keytar before? Or do ya stick to classical pianos?
Dang, your hair is pretty elaborate! How long does it take ya to do it every day?
Do ya got a favorite animal? I don't think I could pick one, myself!
"Hu Tao," eh? Am I sayin' that right? "Hu Tao?" Can I just call ya "Hu?"
So what exactly do ya do where you're gettin' ghosts in your shoes?
Man, bats are totally underrated animals! People don't realize how cute they are when ya really look at 'em!
Ya seem real nervous. There's not, like, someone who's forcin' ya to play, right?
Hey, I've always wondered, what's it like havin' an arm cannon? I bet it gets in the way a lot whenever ya need two hands, eh?
Hey, you're like a treasure hunter, right? Ya ever hear of a magic sword called the "Grimblade?"
So people in your world still fight with swords and stuff, eh? That's pretty metal!
Hey, I just remembered, I saw this super chick on the news who kinda looks like you. Ya think she's my world's version of you?
Are dragons real big where you come from? I've only know 'em to be all human-sized and stuff. Not very exciting.
So... you're not gonna talk? At all?
If you got those signs, we can probably work with yes or no questions... Hey, ya like metal?
You said you're like a mind-reader or somethin'? H-how many of my secrets have you read already?
What's it like, goin' through other people's dreams and stuff?
You're human, right? I've never seen someone with blue skin before that wasn't, like, a zombie or somethin'.

So your hand's really missin', eh? It's not just some kinda weird illusion? I won't ask what happened, but I will ask why you don't got anything in its place. They got pretty rad robot parts now, or even just a hook would be pretty badass!
So what do ya wanna do when you're done school? Not somethin' that requires much talkin', I hope!
What's it like wearin' that helmet you had on? I mean, a helmet's a helmet, but yours probably has displays all kinds of data and stuff, right?
So you gotta have one'a those crystal things to be a Blade, right? Ya think I could have one'a those somewhere I can't see...?
So you're doin' the whole "evil minion" thing, eh? What kinda job benefits do ya get for that -- aside from those stylin' socks bein' part of your uniform?
So you're some kinda researcher, eh? Any chance ya know much about super powers?
So what kinds of science stuff do ya love researchin'?
I'm gonna be real, I can't understand a word you're sayin'. I'm not even sure I have your name right. Is it "Gloria" or "Goriya?"
So you're a demon? Like, an actual demon? Somehow ya don't seem... demonic enough.
So you're the "Princess of Death," eh? That's pretty metal! Reminds me of the "Princess of Darkness" that rules some place up north.
Soon enough, I'm gonna have that same problem as you -- people claimin' to love me before they ever get to know me. Bein' a celebrity ain't easy, eh?
Hey, Wiki-sensei, here's somethin' cool to use your encyclopedia power on: Tell the nice folks here some cool facts about my second home, Yokohama.
You seem like a really hard-workin' student. You remember to take some time to blow off some steam every once in a while, right?
So you're big on gamin', huh? I bet ya can't beat me at rhythm games! Those're my jam!
So what kinda music does a totally normal girl like yourself like to listen to? I bet the stuff I play would make your ears bleed!
So what kinda music does... someone who does whatever it is ya do usually listen to?
If I had to guess based on your outfit, I bet what my band plays is right up your alley. We play alternative metal and stuff, that sound good to ya?
Hey, what's the coolest thing you've ever done with your powers?
So uh, is there anything I can do to be a better opponent to play against for ya -- y'know, with ya bein' blind and all?
Hey, what's your favorite game to play? Doesn't have to be cards, just in general.
Ya shouldn't be seein' this line. It's probably playin' cuz I ran outta things to say!
♪Screatching tires, but never a collision, endless day without a sunset provision! Endless day!♪
A tie? That's not very metal!
Let's settle this tie with a guitar duel! Doesn't matter if ya don't know how to play one, just do your best!
Is it even worth sayin' anything about this...?
♪This round doesn't have any stripping!♪ Actually wait, that reference doesn't work, cuz I can't say "but this one!" There really isn't any strippin'!
Well to be fair, Toyslinger's plunger guns have also taken down a few dudes, maybe more I don't know about, so "takin' down dudes" ain't the question here.
That's pretty cool! I hear it's hard to learn a second language if ya don't start young, so props to ya!
Y'know, your look's pretty metal. Get a black shirt instead of a white one and it'll be perfect.
What the--?! Where'd he--?! What?!

R-right, yeah, of course! Th-that was my point! Doesn't matter how many people laugh at ya, what matters is that ya like your own look! That's why ya got my support in, uh... whatever ya do as Cat Boy!
Gah!
Heck yeah! Kick those stupid sandals away!
Still. What kind of cruel god -- or goddess -- would design you that way? What's wrong with lettin' ya fly all the time?
♪Bitch~!♪ That's not from a song, I just thought that'd be funny.
♪Thanks for nothing, absolutely nothing, thanks for all of your bullshit too!♪
♪Never cared for what they do! Never cared for what they know!♪ Gah ha! I can't take that part seriously when he says "know" like "♪know-ow!♪" It's too cheesy!
I ain't gonna complain about what you're takin' off, but I will complain about a lack of flourish.
That's fine. You don't gotta take off anything excitin' any more that I gotta become a super hero just cuz I have a super power.
Huh, now that I think about it, I could totally wear some accessories made of ice. I dunno how long they'd last, though...
Ya ever hear about those super heroes who get powered up by their ~clothing~? Wouldn't it be rad to have somethin' like that?
Yeah, you're probably right about both of those things! I ain't that good at card games!
"Runt," eh? Is that how that works? Ya think ya could, like, work out your wings to get the wing strength ya need to fly right?
Aw c'mon man, ya can't go around rippin' other people's clothes off. Respect other people's property, yo! You owe Gasser new underwear!
Uh, hi, I guess?
... Not gonna lie, if that rocket bursts in-air, that'd be pretty sweet.
The only thing sandals are good for is bein' the easiest type of footwear to kick off your foot!
♪Thanks for nothing, positively nothing, thanks for everything you didn't do!♪
♪When I get through this part, will the next one be the same? Will I be wondering if ~name~ took anything off?♪
Whatevs. If every strip was special, we wouldn't appreciate the sexy parts!
I'll just consider that a sound check.
I guess now we know strippin' ain't a super power of yours!

I hear they got classes on seduction at that "evil school." Ya think that could teach ya how to turn someone on by takin' ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off? I mean, not that ya need to, just wonderin'...

Good thing you're not one'a those dudes who wears ~clothing.ifPlural(enchanted ~clothing~ that keep|an enchanted ~clothing~ that keeps)~ your powers from goin' outta control. Just like... uh... I was sure there was someone...
That's cool! Reminds me of those super hero dudes I see on the news who use their powers to get animals outta bad homes and stuff! Ya ever see those dudes?
No? Well what do ya -- woah woah woah, where's your hat goin'?

Oh, that's all? Just a prank? I was hopin' for somethin' a little... grander. Like this one time I made a giant pair of ice gauntlets to fight someone with, and I punched her so hard that they shattered! You've never done anything like that?
Whoa!
Dang... Do ya know anyone who does do that genetic engineerin' stuff, at least...?
No no no, I haven't been up to anything! So what kinda lawyer do I need for copyright stuff?
Er, well, you're probably right, but gettin' the "good" result means the right guy gets sentenced, and that's all that matters, right?
Keh heh, well, at least I ain't the only one. So why law in particular?
So what's it like? If I were on stage and not playin' music, I wouldn't know what to do!
I guess you're right... I mean, Megitsune is a pretty dope song, traditional elements or no.
Huntress-in-training it is! So what do ya hunt? Like deer and stuff, or do ya mean you're a bounty hunter?
Gah ha! Can't say I was expectin' "air pirate." I was expectin' like "fancy masseur" or somethin'! It's pretty cool how ya keep people safe by takin' from dangerous people!
Sorry, I didn't mean to dis your look, I get that ya wear that cuz ya actually are a school girl! So what would ya be wearin' if ya didn't come straight from school?
Okay, so I guess you're not a wrestler, but feel free to use that name and tagline if ya become one!
Oh geez. We sometimes get caught in storms on the road, but we always got the option to pull over and wait it out. Ya can't exactly do that on the sea, eh?
Well, either way, ya heard that "call to action" or whatever and ya answered it! Not a lotta people do that -- er, relatively speakin'.
Gah ha! That's a pretty great coincidence!... Wait, maybe it ain't a coincidence! Maybe earth stole techno rock culture from Mejare!... Somehow!
That's okay, ya don't gotta sing any of 'em. The point of a shanty is to sing it with your crew, right?
Yeah yeah, I know what "tan" means, I'm Japanese. I mean why do you use "tan?" It just doesn't seem fittin' is all.
Er, uh, never mind the "game" thing. So what do ya do? Somethin' about shrines, right?
That's fair. It can be fun to play around with other music styles, but if that ain't your thing, that's cool. Keytars are definitely fun to mess with, though!

Ah, good. I just wanted to make sure, cuz ya kinda seemed like someone had a sniper targetin' ya or somethin'! You're here now, so ya already got over the first hurdle: Gettin' started! Ya know how often people don't even get that far?
I guess I should'a known. Hey, this one bug-themed chick I saw had this big, mechanical pincer on her arm. You got anything like that?

Er, right, sorry! I always thought stuff like your sweater are kinda weird. It keeps some of ya warm, but the exposed parts will get cold. It's like, what kinda weather is somethin' like that meant for, anyway?
Well, some people still use swords if they got magic ones or whatevs, but most people use guns cuz the skill floor is real low. Though they're pretty ineffective again a lotta super dudes!
See if this sounds like you: Tall pretty blonde whose only super power is super strength, so she uses her smarts to build herself a suit of power armor and an axe that can shoot lightning.
Oh shit, she's even got a sign for it. That's cool! I respect your commitment to your act!
No? Well what do ya -- oh right, you can't answer that one... This is gonna be harder than I thought...
Uh, why're you squirtin' your socks? Is this some kinda innuendo I don't get?
Well you're wearin' a lotta things, it was hard to be sure. You could also be known for stockin' stuff, I dunno. Or it could've been because you're stacked... No, I guess that one doesn't work...
Wait, how's that work? Ya know fishin' boats are a thing, right? Humans don't need land to hurt the ocean.
Wait, how's that work? What's the ocean gonna do to bring balance?
Sure, sure, everyone's the hero of their own story. Hate to break it to ya, but good guys don't assemble teams of mooks.
... So you don't talk, eh? That's, uh... That's cool.
So, uh, you're just a normal school chick, right? Not one'a those super hero school peps?
Gah ha ha! Sorry, I can't stop thinkin' about how you're dressed like a Vegas grandma!
Oh yeah, you got that floatin' ability. Dunno if I like that more than the idea of flyin' around with wings...
Let's hear ya sing somethin', then! If your singin's great, we gotta hear it!
Okay, so, what are ya, then? Ya got the look of somethin', so if ya ain't an idol, what are ya?
Oh, hey, ya dropped a paper there.
Keh heh. Looks kinda... Well, y'know... You ever, uh... n-never mind...
Ugh, for real? Dang! Screw 'em for not lettin' ya express yourself!
If there was a place where people did that but with guitar duels instead, I'd probably become a crime-fighter!

Oh, y'know, they got various costumes, as super heroes do. There's this one chick whose got this bunny-themed robot armor suit. You could probably get one'a those too and take your animal-rescuin' to another level!
Huh. I guess that ain't so bad, givin' creatures their homes back.
Humans haven't taken ocean like ocean's takin' land, though. That's why the ice caps meltin' is such a big deal.
Oh, okay, well there ya go! Now ya can strip!
Whatevs. My job is to rock, not arrest people.

Oh, yeah yeah! Dope is good!
Oh, y'know, it's a dude that fights another dude for fun. The league I was in even allowed dudes to use powers and gadgets and stuff to make the fights more excitin'.
